   tejasītthamaprastutapraśaṃsā sambhavati  aho bālapriyā sati,	tejasi itTam aprastuta praSaMsA samBavati  ahaH bAlapriyA sati,
   yadvā  svātmaviṣayakamityarthaḥ /	yat vA  svAtma vizayakam iti arTaH /
   atyantamanucitamiti /	atyantam anucitam iti /
   kāmamastu svātmavyatiriktajanāpekṣayā tulyaramaṇābhāvasya sambhāvanā	kAmam astu sva Atma vyatirikta jana apekzayA tulya ramaNa aBAvasya samBAvanA
   svātmāpekṣayāpi tatsambhāvanā na	sva Atma apekzayA api tad samBAvanA na
   yuktetyatastadvacanamatyantānucitamityarthaḥ /	yuktA iti atas tat vacanam atyanta anucitam iti arTaH /
   kuto /	kutas /
   ḍanaucityamityata āha  ātmanyapītyādi /	xana Ocityam iti atas Aha  a Atmani api ityAdi /
   tadrūpāsambhāvanāyāmiti /	tad rUpA samBAvanAyAm iti /
   tadanurūpasaundaryasya sambhāvanāyā abhāve satītyarthaḥ /	tad anurUpa sOndaryasya samBAvanAyAH aBAve sati iti arTaH /
   tulyaramaṇatvasambhāvanāyā abhāve satītyartho vā /	tulya ramaNa tva samBAvanAyAH aBAve sati iti arTaH vA /
   rāgitāyāṃ tadrāgitve sati /	rAgitAyAm tad rAgi tve sati /
   ślokasyāsya prabandhāntargatatve yathā prakaraṇānuguṇārthaparikalpanaṃ,	Slokasya asya prabanDa antargata tve yaTA prakaraNa anuguNa arTa parikalpa naM,
   tathā pradarśya na cetyādigranthamavatārayati  nanu cetyādi /	taTA pradarSya na ca ityAdi granTam avatArayati  nanu ca ityAdi /
   rāgiṇo 'pīyamuktiḥ kinna bhavatīti sambandhaḥ, bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /	rAgiNaH api iya muktiH kinna Bavati iti sambanDaH, Bavati eva iti arTaH /
   nanu tadabhāva ukta evetyata āha  kutaścidityādi /	nanu tad aBAvaH uktaH eva iti atas Aha  kutaScid ityAdi /
   svāsaubhāgyābhimānagarbheti /	sva asOBAgya aBimAna garBA iti /
   tulyaramaṇābhāvāditi tu svavyatiriktajanāpekṣayeti bhāvaḥ /	tulya ramaNa aBAvAt iti tu sva vyatirikta jana apekzayA iti BAvaH /
   rāgijanoktitvamupapādya vītarāgauktitvamatpapādayati  vītetyādi /	rAgi jana ukti tvam upapAdya vIta rAgOkti tva matpa pAda yati   vIta ityAdi /
   vītarāgasya vā iyamuktina na sambhāvyeti sambandhathaḥ,	vIta rAgasya vA iyamuktina na samBAvyA iti sambanDaTaH,
   sambhāvyaivetyarthaḥ /	samBAvyA eva iti arTaH /
   atra hetumāha  anādītyādi /	atra hetumAha  ana Adi ityAdi /
   tathā paśyataḥ niratiśayalāvaṇyādiguṇaśālitayā paśyataḥ /	taTA paSyataH niratiSaya lAvaNya Adi guNa SAli tayA paSyataH /
   tathā darśanācca pūrvarāgavāsanāvaśāt tathāvidhoktiḥ sambhavatyevetyarthaḥ	taTA darSanAt ca pUrva rAga vAsanA vaSAt taTAviDa uktiH samBavati eva iti arTaH
   vastutastathā paśyata ityetadupapādayati  na hītyādi /	vastutas taTA paSyate iti etat upapAdayati  na hi ityAdi /
   nigamayati  tasmāditi /	nigamayati  tasmAt iti /
   ubhayasya rāgiṇo vītarāgasya ca /	uBayasya rAgiNaH vIta rAgasya ca /
   uktameva draḍhayitumāha  aprastutetyādi /	uktam eva draXayitum Aha  a prastutA ityAdi /
   sambhavannevāprastuto 'rtho vaktavya iti sambandhaḥ /	samBavan= eva aprastutaH arTaH vaktavyaH iti sambanDaH /
   vyatirekapradarśanenoktameva sādhayati  na hītyacādi /	vyatireka pradarSanena uktam eva sADayati  na hi iti aca Adi /
   tejasi prastutatejoviṣaye /	tejasi prastuta tejaH vizaye /
   viśeṣamāha  setyādi /	viSezam Aha  sa ityAdi /
   sā aprastutapraśaṃsā /	sA aprastuta praSaMsA /
   prastutaparatayā prastutārthatātparyakatayā /	prastuta para tayA prastuta arTa tAtparyaka tayA /
   itīti hetau /	iti iti hetO /
   atreti /	atra iti /
   lāvaṇyetyādāvityarthaḥ /	lAvaNya ityAdO= iti arTaH /
   nāsambhava iti /	na asamBavaH iti /
   abhidheyasyeti śeṣaḥ /	aBiDeyasya iti SezaH /
   kintūktarītyā sambhavo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /	kintu ukta rItyA samBavaH asti iti BAvaH /
   vṛttau  'aprastutapraśaṃse'ti /	vRttO   aaprastuta praSaMse ati /
   sārūpyanibandhanāprastutapraśaṃsetyarthaḥ /	sArUpya nibanDanA prastuta praSaMsA iti arTaH /
   'guṇībhūtātmane'ti /	aguNIBUta Atmane ati /
   upāyabhūtenetyarthaḥ /	upAya BUtena iti arTaH /
   atra vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyamityato	atra vyaFgya upaskRtasya vAcya arTasya eva prADAnyam iti atas 
   'prastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāra iti bodhyam /	aprastuta praSaMsA alaFkAraH iti boDyam /
   tasyaivaṃvidhāvikalpaparihāraikavyāpāratvāt /	tasya evaMviDa avikalpa parihAra eka vyApAra tvAt /
   na cāyaṃ ślokaḥ kvacitprabandha iti śrūyate, yena	na ca ayam SlokaH kvacid prabanDaH iti SrUyate, yena
   tatprakaraṇānugatārthatāsya parikalpayate /	tad prakaraNa anugata arTa tA asya parikalpayate /
   tasmādaprastutapraśaṃseyam /	tasmAt aprastuta praSaMsA iyam /
   yasmādanena vācyena guṇībhūtātmanā nissāmānyaguṇāvalopādhmātasya	yasmAt anena vAcyena guNIBUta AtmanA nissAmAnya guNa avalopa ADmAtasya
   nijamāhimotkarṣajanitasamatsarajanajvarasya viśeṣajñamātmano na	nijamAhima utkarza janita samatsara jana jvarasya viSeza jQam AtmanaH na
   kañcidevāparaṃ paśyataḥ paridevitametaditi prakāśyate /	kaQcid eva aparam paSyataH paridevitam etat iti prakASyate /
   tathā cāyaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiḥ /	taTA ca ayam Darma kIrteH SlokaH iti prasidDiH /
   sambhāvyate ca tasyaiva /	samBAvyate ca tasya eva /
   yasmāt   anadhyavasitāvagāhanamanalpadhīśaktinā 	yasmAt   anaDyavasita avagAhanam analpaDI SaktinA 
   pyadṛṣṭaparamārthatattvamadhikābhiyogairapi /	pyadRzwa parama arTa tattvam aDika aBiyogEH api /
   locanam dhikte kārṣṇyamiti sā paraṃ prastutaparatayeti nātrāsambhava	locanam Dik te kArzNyam iti sA param prastuta paratayA iti na atra asamBava
   ityāśaṅkyāha  na ceti /	iti ASaFkya aha  na ca iti /
   nissāmānyeti nijamahimeti viśeṣajñamiti	nissAmAnya iti nija mahimA iti viSeza jQam iti
   paridevitamityetaiścaturbhirvākyakhaṇḍaiḥ krameṇa pādacatuṣṭayasya	paridevitam iti etEH caturBiH vAkya KaNxEH krameNa pAda catuzwayasya
   tātparyaṃ vyākhyātam /	tAtparyam vyAKyAtam /
   nanvatrāpi kiṃ pramāṇamityāśaṅkyāha  tathā ceti /	nanu atra api kim pramANam iti ASaFkya Aha   taTA ca iti /
   nanu kimiyatetyāśaṅkya tadāśayena nirvivādatadīyaślokārpitenāsyāśayaṃ	nanu kimiyatA iti ASaFkya tad ASayena nirvivAda tadIya Sloka arpitena asya ASayam
   saṃvādayati  sambhāvyata iti /	saMvAdayati   samBAvyate iti /
   avagāhanamadhyavasitamapi na yatra āstāṃ tasya sampādanam /	avagAhana maDya vasitam api na yatra AstAm tasya sampAdanam /
   bālapriyā locane  krameṇeti /	bAla priyA locane   krameNa iti /
   nissāmānyaguṇetyanena lāvaṇyetyādyapādatātparyārtha uktaḥ, evaṃvadato	nissAmAnya guNa iti anena lAvaNya ityAdya pAda tAtparya arTaH uktaH, evaMvadataH 
   hyalokasāmānyaguṇagaṇapūrṇatvādaho /	hi aloka sAmAnya guNa gaNa pUrNa tvAt aho /
   ahamiti mahīyānavalepaḥ parisphuṭaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /	aham iti mahIyAnavalepaH parisPuwam gamyate iti BAvaH /
   atrāpīti /	atra api iti /
   aprastutapraśaṃsāpakṣe 'pītyarthaḥ /	aprastuta praSaMsA pakze api iti arTaH /
   vṛttau  'tathāce'tyādi /	vRttO   ataTA Ace atyAdi /
   cakāro hetau /	cakAraH hetO /
   yato 'yaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka	yatas ayam Darma kIrteH SlokaH iti prasidDi H atas taTA pUrva ukta arTaka
   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
   viniścayavṛttyante sthito 'yaṃ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka	viniScaya vRtti ante sTitaH ayam SlokaH iti prasidDi H atas taTA pUrva ukta arTaka
   ityarthaḥ /	iti arTaH /
   viniścayavṛttyante sthito 'yaṃ śloka iti śrūyate /	viniScaya vRtti ante sTitaH ayam SlokaH iti SrUyate /
   locane  kimityādi /	locane  kim ityAdi /
   iyateti /	iyata iti /
   dharmakīrteḥ śloka ityetāvatetyarthaḥ /	Darma kIrteH SlokaH iti etAvatA iti arTaH /
   tadāśayena dharmakīrterāśayena /	tad ASayena Darma kIrteH ASayena /
   nirvivādeti /	nirvivAda iti /
   prakṛtodāharaṇe hi vivādo vyājastutyaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayo na	prakRta udAharaNe hi vivAdaH vyAjastutya prastuta praSaMsA vizayaH na
   vakṣyamāṇatadīyaśloka iti bhāvaḥ /	vakzyamANa tadIya SlokaH iti BAvaH /
   asyeti /	asya iti /
   lāvaṇyetyādiprakṛtaślokasyetyarthaḥ /	lAvaNya ityAdi prakRta Slokasya iti arTaH /
   saṃvādayatīti /	saMvAdayati iti /
   ayaṃ bhāvaḥ  yo yasyāśayo 'nyatra suspaṣṭapratipattikassa eva sambhavan	ayam BAvaH  yaH yasya ASayaH anyatra su spazwa pratipattikaH saH eva samBavan
   anyatrāparisphuṭapratītike viṣaye 'pyadhyavasātumucita ityato	anyatra aparisPuwa pratItike vizaye api aDyavasAtum ucitaH iti atas 
   vākyaśeṣanyāyānusāreṇātrāprastutapraśaṃsāvadhāraṇasiddhiriti /	vAkya Seza nyAya anusAreNa atra aprastuta praSaMsA avaDAraNa sidDiH iti /
   vṛttau  'sambhāvyate ca tasyaive'ti /	vRttO   asamBAvyate ca tasya eve ati /
   śloko 'yaṃ dharmakīrtisambandhitvenaivānumīyate cetyarthaḥ /	SlokaH ayam Darma kIrti sambanDi tvena eva anumIyate ca iti arTaH /
   atra hetumāha  'yasmāda'tyādi /	atra hetum Aha   ayasmAt a atyAdi /
   'anadhyavasite'ti /	aanaDyavasite ati /
   anadhyavasitaṃ sudhībhirna sampipādayiṣitamavagāhanamavabodhaḥ, payaḥpakṣe	anaDyavasitam suDIBiH na sampipAt ayizitam avagAhanam avaboDaH, payaH pakze
   yadā dānāyāntaḥ praveśo yasya tat /	yadA dAnAya antar praveSaH yasya tat /
   analpā dhīśaktirbuddhisāmarthyaṃ yasya tenāpyanyena kenacit kartrā /	analpAH DI SaktiH budDi sAmarTyam yasya tena api anyena kenacid kartrA /
   adhikairabhiyogaiḥ prayatnairapi /	aDikEH aBiyogEH prayatnEH api /
   adṛṣṭāniparamārthatattvāni yatra /	adRzwa aniparama arTa tattvAni yatra /
   yadgatānyutkṛṣṭārthatattvānyadṛṣṭapūrvāṇītyarthaḥ /	yat gatAni utkRzwa arTa tattvAni adRzwa pUrvANi iti arTaH /
   payaḥpakṣe tvetallocane vivṛtam  alabdhetyādi ca /	payaH pakze tu etat locane vivRtam   alabDa ityAdi ca /
   mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva	matam mama jagati alabDa sadRSa pratigrAhakam prayAsyati payoniDeH payaH iva
   svadehe jārām //	sva dehe jArAm //
   ityanenāpi ślokenaivaṃvidho 'bhiprāyaḥ prakāśita eva /	iti anena api Slokena evaMviDaH aBiprAyaH prakASitaH eva /
   locanam paramaṃ yadarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādibhyo 'pyuttamam, alabdhaṃ	locanam paramam yad arTa tattvam kOstuBa AdiByaH api uttamam, alabDam
   prayatnaparīkṣitamapi na prāptaṃ sadṛśaṃ yasya tathābhūtaṃ	prayatna parIkzitam api na prAptam sadRSam yasya taTABUtam
   pratigrāhamekaiko grāho jalacaraḥ prāṇī airāvatoccaiḥśravodhanvantariprāyo	pratigrAham ekEkaH grAhaH jalacaraH prANI ErAvata uccEHSravaH Danvantari prAyaH 
   yatra tadalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakam /	yatra tad alabDa sadRSa pratigrAhakam /
   evaṃvidha iti /	evaMviDaH iti /
   paridevitaviṣaya ityarthaḥ /	paridevita vizayaH iti arTaH /
   iyati cārthe aprastutapraśaṃsopamālakṣaṇamalaṅkāradvayam /	iyati ca arTe aprastuta praSaMsA upamA lakzaNam alaFkAra dvayam /
   anantaraṃ tu svātmani vismayadhāmatayādbhute viśrāntiḥ /	anantaram tu sva Atmani vismaya DAmatayA adBute viSrAntiH /
   parasya bālapriyā evaṃ bhūtaṃ mama mataṃ matapratipādako granthaḥ /	parasya bAla priyA evam BUtam mama matam mata pratipAdakaH granTaH /
   alabdhaḥ sadṛśaḥ svatulyaḥ pratigrāhako 'nyān pratibodhayitā svayaṃ bo /	alabDaH sadRSaH sva tulyaH pratigrAhakaH anyAn pratiboDayitA svayam baH /
   ca yasya tathāvidhaṃ sat /	ca yasya taTAviDam sat /
   svadehe jarāṃ prayāsyati jīrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /	sva dehe jarAm prayAsyati jIrNam Bavizyati /
   anadhyavasitamityanena kaimutyena labdhamarthamāha locane  āstāmityādi /	anaDyavasitam iti anena kEmutyena labDam arTam Aha locane  AH tAm ityAdi /
   tasyeti /	tasya iti /
   avagāhanasyetyarthaḥ /	avagAhanasya iti arTaH /
   paramamityasya vivaraṇam  kaustubhādibhyo 'pyuttamaṃ yadarthatattvamiti /	paramam iti asya vivaraNam   kOstuBa AdiByaH api uttamam yad arTa tattvam iti /
   adṛṣṭaṃ paramaṃ yasmāttathāvidhamarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādiṃ yatra tat /	adRzwam paramam yasmAt taTAviDam arTa tattvam kOstuBa Adim yatra tat /
   yadgatārthatattvāduttamamanyatrādṛṣṭamityartha iti bhāvaḥ /	yat gata arTa tattvAt uttamam anyatra adRzwam iti arTaH iti BAvaH /
   lābhaniṣedhena tadupāyānveṣaṇaṃ sidhyatītyāśayenāha  prayatnetyādi /	lABa nizeDena tad upAya anvezaNam siDyati iti ASayena aha   prayatna ityAdi /
   sadṛśamiti /	sadRSam iti /
   vastviti śeṣaḥ /	vastu iti SezaH /
   tathābhūtaṃ pratigrāhamiti /	taTABUtam pratigrAham iti /
   pratigrāhamiti vīpsāyāmavyayībhāvaḥ /	pratigrAham iti vIpsAyAm avyayIBAvaH /
   'avyayībhāvaśce'ti napuṃsakatvam /	aavyayIBAvaH ce ati napuMsaka tvam /
   pratītyasya vivaraṇam  ekaika iti /	pratItyasya vivaraNam   ekEkaH iti /
   grāhaśabdaścatra na mukhyārthakaḥ, kintu	grAha SabdaH catra na muKya arTakaH, kintu
   jalacaraprāṇitvaguṇayogenārthāntaravartītyāha  jalacara ityādi /	jala cara prANi tva guNa yogena arTa antara vartI iti Aha   jala caraH ityAdi /
   yadgatairāvaṇādijalacarasadṛśaṃ vastvanyatra labdhamityarthaḥ /	yat gatErAvaNa Adi jala cara sadRSam vastu anyatra labDam iti arTaH /
   iyati cārtha iti /	iyati ca arTaH iti /
   ukte ślokadvayavācyārthe ityarthaḥ /	ukte Sloka dvaya vAcya arTe iti arTaH /
   aprastutetyādi /	aprastutA ityAdi /
   lāvaṇyetyādāvaprastutapraśaṃsā anadhyavasitetyādāvupameti	lAvaNya iti AdO= aprastuta praSaMsA anaDyavasitA iti AdO= upamA iti
   tadātmakālaṅkāradvayamityarthaḥ /	tad Atmaka alaFkAra dvayam iti arTaH /
   anantarantviti /	anantarantu iti /
   uktālaṅkārasundaravācyārthapratītyuttarakālamityarthaḥ /	ukta alaFkAra sundara vAcya arTa pratIti uttara kAlam iti arTaH /
   svātmanīti /	sva Atmani iti /
   vaktā dharmakīrtiratra svātmaśabdārthaḥ /	vaktA Darma kIrtiH atra sva Atma Sabda arTaH /
   vismayeti /	vismaya iti /
   vismayaviṣayatvenetyarthaḥ /	vismaya vizaya tvena iti arTaH /
   lāvaṇyetyādau svasya lokaguṇagaṇapūrṇatvapratipādanenānadhyavasitetyādau	lAvaNya ityAdO svasya loka guNa gaNa pUrNa tva pratipAdanena anaDya vasita ityAdO
   tādṛṅmatapravartakatvapratapādanena cātmano	tAdRS mata pravartaka tva pratapAdanena ca AtmanaH 
   viśvottaratvapratyāyanāttatpadyaśroturātmaviṣayakavismayajananāditi bhāvaḥ	viSva uttara tva pratyAyanAt tad padya SrotuH Atma vizayaka vismaya jananAt iti BAvaH
   yadvā  vismayadhāmatayeti /	yat vA  vismaya DAmatayA iti /
   vismayāśrayatvenetyarthaḥ /	vismaya ASraya tvena iti arTaH /
   tattacchalokena piratipāditāyāstathāvidhasya svasya svamatasya ca	tad tat Salokena piratipAditAyAH taTAviDasya svasya sva matasya ca
   tathāvidhaśocyāvasthāyāḥ svapne 'pyasambhāvyāyāḥ sambhavāt svasya vismayaḥ	taTAviDa Socya avasTAyAH svapne api asamBAvyAyAH samBavAt svasya vismayaH
   adbhute viśrāntiriti /	adBute viSrAntiH iti /
   sahṛdayānāṃ tadvismayacarvaṇayeti bhāvaḥ /	sahRdayAnAm tad vismaya carvaNayA iti BAvaH /
   anadhyavavasitetyādiślokasya vīrarase 'pi viśrāntimāha  paresya cetyādi /	anaDyavavasita ityAdiSlokasya vIra rase api viSrAntim Aha   paresya ca ityAdi /
   aprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ ca yadvācyaṃ tasya kadācidvivakṣitatvaṃ,	aprastuta praSaMsAyAm ca yat vAcyam tasya kadAcid vivakzita tvaM,
   kadācidavivākṣitatvaṃ, kadācidvivakṣitāvivakṣitatvamiti trayī bandhacchāyā	kadAcid avivAkzita tvaM, kadAcid vivakzita avivakzita tvam iti trayI banDa= CAyA
   tatra vivakṣitatvaṃ yathā   parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi	tatra vivakzita tvam yaTA  para arTe yaH pIxAm anuBavati BaFge api
   madhuro yadīyaḥ sarveṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /	maDuraH yadIyaH sarvezAm iha Kalu vikAraH api aBimataH /
   na samprāpto vṛrddhi yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na	na samprAptaH vRrdDi yadi sa BRSam akzetra patitaH kim ikzoH dezaH asO na
   punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //	punar aguNAyAH maru BuvaH //
   yathā vā mamaiva    amī ye dṛśyaneti nanu subhagarūpāḥ saphalatā	yaTA vA mama eva   amI ye dRSyanA iti nanu suBaga rUpAH saPala tA
   bhavatyeṣāṃ yasya kṣaṇamupagatānāṃ viṣayatām /	Bavati ezAm yasya kzaNam upagatAnAm vizaya tAm /
   locanam ca śrotṛjanasyātyādarāspadatayā prayatnagrāhyatayā	locanam ca SrotR janasya ati Adara Aspada tayA prayatna grAhya tayA
   cotsāhajananenaivaṃbhūtamatyantopādeyaṃ satkatipayasamucitajanānugrāhakaṃ	ca utsAha jananena evaMBUtam atyanta upAdeyam sat kati paya samucita jana anugrAhakam
   kṛtamiti svātmani kuśalakāritāpradarśanayā dharmavīrasparśanena vīrarase	kRtam iti sva Atmani kuSala kAritA pradarSanayA Darma vIra sparSanena vIra rase
   viśrāntiriti mantavyam anyathā paridevitamātreṇa kiṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /	viSrAntiH iti mantavyam anyaTA paridevita mAtreNa kim kRtam syAt /
   aprekṣāpūrmakāratvamātmanyāveditaṃ cetkiṃ tataḥ	aprekzA pUrma kAra tvam Atmani Aveditam ced kim tatas 
   svārthaparārthāsambhavādityalaṃ bahunā /	sva arTa para arTa asamBavAt iti alam bahunA /
   nanu yathāsthitasyārthasyāsaṅgatau bhavatvaprastutapraśaṃsā, iha tu	nanu yaTA sTitasya arTasya asaFgatO Bavatu aprastuta praSaMsA, iha tu
   saṅgatirastyevetyāśaṅkya saṅgatāvapi bhavatyevaiṣeti	saFgatiH asti eva iti ASaFkya saFgatO= api Bavati eva ezA iti
   darśayitumupakramate   aprastuteti /	darSayitum upakramate   a prastutA iti /
   nanviti /	nanu iti /
   yairidaṃ jagadbhūṣitamityarthaḥ /	yEH idam jagat BUzitam iti arTaH /
   yasya cakṣuṣo viṣayatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ gatānāmeṣāṃ saphalatā bhavati tadidaṃ	yasya cakzuzaH vizaya tAm kzaNam gatAnAm ezAm sa Pala tA Bavati tat idam
   bālapriyā śrotṛjanasyotsāhajanane hetudvayam  atyādaretyādi /	bAla priyA SrotR janasya utsAha janane hetu dvayam   ati Adara ityAdi /
   matasyeti /	matasya iti /
   śeṣaḥ /	SezaH /
   utsāheti /	utsAha iti /
   matagrahaviṣayakotsāhetyarthaḥ /	mata graha vizayaka utsAha iti arTaH /
   evaṃbhūtamityādi /	evaMBUtam ityAdi /
   matamiti śeṣaḥ /	matam iti SezaH /
   kuśalakāriteti /	kuSala kAritA iti /
   sanmatanirmāṇarūpasatkarmakāritetyarthaḥ /	sat mata nirmANa rUpa sat karma kAri tA iti arTaH /
   anyatheti /	anyaTA iti /
   rasaviśrāntyabhāva ityarthaḥ /	rasa viSrAnti aBAvaH iti arTaH /
   paridevitamātreṇeti /	paridevita mAtreNa iti /
   mātraśabdenapūrvoktaviśrāntisthalaparyavasānavyavacchedaḥ /	mAtra Sabdena pUrva ukta viSrAnti sTala paryavasAna vyavacCedaH /

   vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānye dhvanisaṃjñitakāvyaprakāraḥ guṇabhāge tu	vyaFgyasya arTasya prADAnye Dvani saMjQita kAvya prakAraH guNa BAge tu

   ca kāvyaṃ kevalavācyavācakavaicitryamātrāśrayeṇopanibaddhamālekhyaprakhyaṃ	ca kAvyam kevala vAcya vAcaka vEcitrya mAtra ASrayeNa upanibadDam AleKya praKyam

   vākyarthatayā sthitaṃ rasāditātparyarahitamutprekṣādi /	vAki arTa tayA sTitam rasa Adi tAtparya rahitam utprekzA Adi /
   atha kimidaṃ citraṃ nāma? yatra na pratīyamānārthasaṃsparśaḥ /	aTa kim idam citram nAma? yatra na pratIyamAna arTa saMsparSaH /
   pratīyamāno hyarthastribhedaḥ prākpradarśitaḥ /	pratIyamAnaH hi arTaH tri BedaH prAc pradarSitaH /
   tatra yatra vastvalaṅgārāntaraṃ vā vyaṅgyaṃ nāsti sa nāma citrasya	tatra yatra vastu alaFgAra antaram vA vyaFgyam na asti sa nAma citrasya
   kalpayatāṃ viṣayaḥ /	kalpayatAm vizayaH /

   yathāsaṃbhavamudāharaṇadvaye yojyā /	yaTAsaMBavam udAharaNa dvaye yojyA /
   tathā hi me yadaraya ityādibhi  sarvaireva padārthauḥ kartetyādibhiśca	taTA hi me yat arayaH ityAdiBi sarvEH eva padArTOH kartA ityAdiBiH ca
   vibhāvādirūpatayā raudra evānugṛhyate /	viBAva Adi rUpa tayA rOdraH eva anugRhyate /
   kartetyādau ca pratipadaṃ pratyavāntaravākyaṃ pratisamāsaṃ ca	kartA ityAdO ca pratipadam pratyavAntara vAkyam pratisamAsam ca
   vyaṅgyamutprekṣituṃ śakyameveti na likhitam /	vyaFgyam utprekzitum Sakyam eva iti na liKitam /
   pāṇḍavā yasya dāsā iti tadīyoktyanukāraḥ /	pANxavAH yasya dAsAH iti tadIya ukti anukAraH /
   tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatāpi yojayituṃ śakyā, vācyasyaiva krodhoddīpakatvāt	tatra guNIBUta vyaFgyatA api yojayitum SakyA, vAcyasya eva kroDa uddIpaka tvAt 
   dāsaiśca kṛtakṛtyaiḥ svāmyavaśyaṃ draṣṭavya ityarthaśaktyanuraṇanarūpatāpi	dAsEH ca kRtakRtyEH svAmi avaSyam drazwavyaH iti arTa Sakti anuraNana rUpa tA api
   ubhayathāpi cārutvādekapakṣagrahe pramāṇābhāvaḥ /	uBayaTA api cAru tvAt eka pakza grahe pramANa aBAvaH /
   ekavyañjakānupraveśastu taireva padaiḥ guṇībhūtavya vyaṅgyasya	eka vyaQjaka anupraveSaH tu tEH eva padEH guNIBUtavyaH vyaFgyasya
   pradhānībhūtasya carasasya vibhāvādidvāratayābhivyañjanāt /	praDAnIBUtasya carasasya viBAva Adi dvAra tayA aBivyaQjanAt /
   bālapriyā vṛttāvatretyasya	bAla priyA vRttO= atra iti asya
   kartetyudāharaṇamātraparāmarśakatvabhramavāraṇāya	kartA iti udAharaNa mAtra parAmarSaka tva Brama vAraNAya
   vivṛṇoti   udādaraṇadvaye 'pīti /	vivRNoti    udAdaraNa dvaye api iti /
   raudrasyeti /	rOdrasya iti /
   nyakkāra ityādau rāvaṇagatasya kartetyādau bhīmasenagatasya ca krodhasya	nyakkAraH ityAdO rAvaNa gatasya kartA ityAdO BImasena gatasya ca kroDasya
   pratīteriti bhāvaḥ /	pratIteH iti BAvaH /
   vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭetyaneneti /	vyaFgya viSizwa iti anena iti /
   vyaṅgyavaiśiṣṭyakathanenetyarthaḥ /	vyaFgya vESizwya kaTanena iti arTaH /
   guṇateti /	guNa tA iti /
   vācyārthaṃ pratīti śeṣaḥ /	vAcya arTam prati iti SezaH /
   uktā darśitā /	uktA darSitAH /
   padaissammiśratetyasya yathāśrutārthasya	padEH sammiSrata iti asya yaTASruta arTasya
   bādhādvyācaṣṭe  padarityupalakṣaṇe tṛtīyeti /	bADAt vi Acazwe  padar iti upalakzaNe tRtIyA iti /
   tadairiti tṛtīyārtho jñāpyatvamityarthaḥ /	tadEH iti tRtIya arTaH jQApya tvam iti arTaH /
   tamevārthaṃ darśayati  tadupalakṣiteti /	tam eva arTam darSayati  tad upalakzitA iti /
   kena sammiśratetyatrāha  yo 'rtha ityādi /	kena sammiSratA iti atra aha  yaH arTaH ityAdi /
   yo 'rthaḥ vācyārthaḥ /	yaH arTaH vAcya arTaH /
   teneti /	tena iti /
   guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vācyenetyartha  /	guNIBUta vyaFgyena vAcyena iti arTa /
   sā ceti /	sA ca iti /
   saṅkīrṇatetyarthaḥ /	saFkIrNa tA iti arTaH /
   tṛtīyāntatrayasyānena sambandhaḥ /	tRtIyAnta trayasya anena sambanDaH /
   kartetyādibhiśceti /	kartA ityAdiBiH ca iti /
   padārthairityanuṣaṅgaḥ /	padArTEH iti anuzaFgaH /
   nanu nyakkāretyādau vyaṅgyārthāḥ pūrvaṃ vyākhyātāḥ /	nanu nyakkAra ityAdO vyaFgya arTAH pUrvam vyAKyAtAH /
   kartetyādau tu te kiṃ na santītyata āha  kartetyādāviti /	kartA ityAdO tu te kim na santi iti atas Aha   kartA iti AdO= iti /
   tadīyoktīti /	tadIya ukti iti /
   pāṇḍavā mama dāsā iti duryodhanoktītyarthaḥ /	pANxavAH mama dAsAH iti duryoDana ukti iti arTaH /
   raudra evānugṛhyata ityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraṃ pradarśya	rOdraH eva anugRhyate iti anena anugrAhya anugrAhaka BAvena saFkaram pradarSya
   sandehayogena taṃ darśayati  tatretyādi /	sandeha yogena tam darSayati  tatra ityAdi /
   pāṇḍavagatāpakarṣādikaṃ bodhyam /	pANxava gata apakarza Adikam boDyam /
   ityarthetyādi /	iti arTa ityAdi /
   uktaṃ yadarthaśaktimūlaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tadrūpatī'pītyarthaḥ /	uktam yad arTa Sakti mUlam vyaFgyam tad rUpatI api iti arTaH /
   yojayituṃ śaktetyanuṣaṅgaḥ /	yojayitum Sakta iti anuzaFgaH /
   abhayathāpītyādi /	aBayaTA api ityAdi /
   tathā ca guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaneśca sandehasaṅkara iti bhāvaḥ /	taTA ca guNIBUta vyaFgyasya DvaneH ca sandeha saFkaraH iti BAvaH /
   tairiti /	tEH iti /
   me yadaraya ityādibhirityarthaḥ /	me yat arayaH ityAdiBiH iti arTaH /
   vibhāvādidvāratayā rasasya cābhivyañjanāditi sambandhaḥ /	viBAva Adi dvAra tayA rasasya ca aBivyaQjanAt iti sambanDaH /
   ata evetyetadvyākhyāyā ta evetyādi na yathāhi dhvaniprabhedāntarāṇi	atas eva iti etat vyAKyAyAH te eva ityAdi na yaTA hi Dvani praBeda antarANi
   parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārthavākyārthāśrayatvena ca na viruddhāni /	parasparam saFkIryante padArTa vAkya arTa ASraya tvena ca na virudDAni /
   kiṃ caikavyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhānaguṇabhāvo virudhyate na tu	kim ca eka vyaFgya ASraya tve tu praDAna guNa BAvaH viruDyate na tu
   vyaṅgyabhedāpekṣayā tato 'pyasya na virodhaḥ /	vyaFgya Beda apekzayA tatas api asya na viroDaH /
   ayaṃ ca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavahāro bahūnāmekatra vācyavācakabhāva iva	ayam ca saFkara saMsRzwi vyavahAraH bahUnAm ekatra vAcya vAcaka BAvaH iva
   vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve 'pi nirvirodha eva mantavyaḥ /	vyaFgya vyaQjaka BAve api nirviroDaH eva mantavyaH /
   yatra tu padāni kānicidavivakṣitavācyānuramanarūpavyaṅgyavācyāni vā tatra	yatra tu padAni kAnicid avivakzita vAcyA anuramana rUpa vyaFgI avAcyAni vA tatra
   dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /	Dvani guNIBUta vyaFgyayoH saMsRzwa tvam /
   yathā  'teṣāṃ gopavadhūvilāsasuhṛdām' ityādau /	yaTA   atezAm gopa vaDU vilAsa suhRdAma ityAdO /
   atra hi 'vilāsasuhṛdā' 'rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇām' ityete pade dhvaniprabhedarūpe	atra hi avilAsa suhRdAa arADArahaH sAkziNAma iti ete pade Dvani praBeda rUpe
   'te' 'jāne' ityete ca pade guṇībhūtavyaṅgyarūpe /	ate a ajAne a iti ete ca pade guNIBUta vyaFgya rUpe /
   locanam ata eva ceti /	locanam atas eva ca iti /
   yato 'tra lakṣye dṛśyate tata ityarthaḥ /	yatas atra lakzye dRSyate tatas iti arTaH /
   nanu vyaṅgyaṃ guṇībhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ ceti viruddhameva	nanu vyaFgyam guNIBUtam praDAnam ca iti virudDam eva
   taddṛśyamānamapyuktatvānna śraddheyamityāśaṅkya vyañjakabhedāttāvanna	tat dRSyamAnam api ukta tvAt na SradDeyam iti ASaFkya vyaQjaka BedAt tAvat na
   virodha iti darśayati  ata eveti /	viroDaH iti darSayati  atas eva iti /
   sveti /	sva iti /
   svaprabhedāntarāṇi saṃkīrṇatayā pūrvamudāhṛtānīta tānyeva dṛṣṭāntayati /	sva praBeda antarANi saMkIrNa tayA pUrvam udAhRtA AnIta tAni eva dRzwAntayati /
   tadeva vyācaṣṭe  yathāhīti /	tat eva vyAcazwe  yaTA ahi iti /
   tathātrāpītyadhyāhāro 'tra kartavyaḥ /	taTA atrApi iti aDyAhAraH atra kartavyaH /
   'tathā hi' iti vā pāṭhaḥ /	ataTA hi a iti vA pAWaH /
   nanu vyañjakabhedātprathamabhedayoḥ parihāro 'stu ekavyañjakānupraveśe tu	nanu vyaQjaka BedAt praTama BedayoH parihAraH astu eka vyaQjaka anupraveSe tu
   kiṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkya pāramārthikaṃ parihāramāha  kiñcetiḥ tato 'pīti /	kim vaktavyam iti ASaFkya pAramArTikam parihAram Aha   kiQcetiH tatas api iti /
   yato 'nyadvyaṅgyaṃ guṇībhūtamanyacca pradhānamiti ko virodhaḥ /	yatas anyat vyaFgyam guNIBUtam anyat ca praDAnam iti kaH viroDaH /
   nanu vācyālaṅkāraviṣaye śruto 'yaṃ saṃkarādivyavahāro na tu vyaṅgyaviṣaya	nanu vAcya alaFkAra vizaye SrutaH ayam saMkara Adi vyavahAraH na tu vyaFgya vizaya
   ityāśaṅkyāha  ayaṃ ceti /	iti ASaFkya aha  ayam ca iti /
   mantavya iti /	mantavyaH iti /
   mananena pratītyā tathā niśceyaḥ ubhayatrāpi pratītereva śaraṇatvāditi	mananena pratItyA taTA niSceyaH uBayatra api pratIteH eva SaraNa tvAt iti
   bhāvaḥ /	BAvaH /
   evaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasaṃkarabhedāstrīnudāhṛtya saṃsṛṣṭimudāharati  yatra	evam guNIBUta vyaFgya saMkara BedAH trIn udAhRtya saMsRzwim udAha rati   yatra
   tu padānīti /	tu padAni iti /
   kānicidityanena bālapriyā virodha ityantaṃ granthamavatārayati  nanvityādi	kAnicid iti anena bAla priyA viroDaH iti antam granTam avatArayati  nanu ityAdi
   dṛśyamānamiti /	dRSyamAnam iti /
   lakṣya iti śeṣaḥ /	lakzyaH iti SezaH /
   sveti /	sva iti /
   dṛṣṭāntayatīti sambandhaḥ /	dRzwAntayati iti sambanDaH /
   svaprabhedāntaravadityanena dṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayatītyarthaḥ /	sva praBeda antara vat iti anena dRzwAntam darSayati iti arTaH /
   prathamabhedayoriti /	praTama BedayoH iti /
   anugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena sandehayogena ca yau saṅkarau tayorityarthaḥ /	anugrAhya anugrAhaka BAvena sandeha yogena ca yO saFkarO tayoH iti arTaH /
   kiṃ vaktavyamiti /	kim vaktavyam iti /
   kiṃ kartavyamiti /	kim kartavyam iti /
   ca pāṭhaḥ /	ca pAWaH /
   vyañjakabhedābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /	vyaQjaka Beda aBAvAt iti BAvaH /
   bhāvamāha  yato 'ntadityādi /	BAvam Aha  yataH antat ityAdi /
   mantavya ityetat prakṛtānuguṇatayā vyācaṣṭe  mananenetyādi /	mantavyaH iti etat prakRta anuguNa tayA vyAcazwe   mananena ityAdi /
   pratītyā sahṛdayapratītyā /	pratItyA sahRdaya pratItyE /
   ityaneneti /	iti anena iti /
   kānicidavivakṣitavācyāni kānicidanuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyavācyānītyuktyetyarthaḥ	kAnicid avivakzita vAcyAni kAnicid anuraNana rUpa vyaFgI avAcyAni iti uktyA iti arTaH
   suhṛdityādi /	suhRd ityAdi /
   mukhyārthayoḥ vācyālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati	muKya arTayoH vAcya alaFkAra saFkIrNa tvam alakzya krama vyaFgyA apekzayA rasavati
   sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /	sa alaFkAre kAvye sarvatra su vyavasTitam /
   prabhedāntarāṇāmapi kadācitsaṅkīrṇatvaṃ bhavatyeva /	praBeda antarANAm api kadAcid saFkIrNa tvam Bavati eva /
   yathā mamaiva   locanam saṃkarāvakāśaṃ nirākaroti /	yaTA mama eva  locanam saMkara avakASam nirAkaroti /
   suhṛcchabdena sākṣiśabdena cāvivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ 'te'	suhRd Sabdena sAkzi Sabdena ca avivakzita vAcyaH DvaniH ate a
   itipadenāsādhāraṇaguṇagaṇo 'bhivyakto 'pi guṇatvamavalambate, vācyasyaiva	iti padena asADAraNa guNa gaNaH aBivyaktaH api guNa tvam avalambate, vAcyasya eva
   smaraṇasya prādhānyena cārutvahetutvāt /	smaraNasya prADAnyena cAru tva hetu tvAt /
   'jāne' ityanenotprekṣyamāṇānantadharmavyañjakenāpi vācyamevotprekṣaṇarūpaṃ	ajAne a iti anena utprekzyamANa ananta Darma vyaQjakena api vAcyam eva utprekzaNa rUpam
   pradhānīkriyate /	praDAnIkriyate /
   evaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgye 'pi catvāro bhedā udāhṛtāḥ /	evam guNIBUta vyaFgye api catvAraH BedAH udAhRtAH /
   adhunālaṅkāragatāṃstāndarśayati  vācyālaṅkāreti /	aDunA alaFkAra gatAn= tAn darSayati  vAcya alaFkAra iti /
   vyaṅgyatve tvalaṅkāraṇāmuktabhedāṣṭaka evāntarbhāva iti vācyaśabdasyāśayaḥ	vyaFgya tve tu alaFkAraNa amukta Beda azwakaH eva antarBAvaH iti vAcya Sabdasya ASayaH
   kāvya iti /	kAvyaH iti /
   evaṃvidhameva hi kāvyaṃ bhavati /	evaMviDam eva hi kAvyam Bavati /
   suvyavasthitamiti /	su vyavasTitam iti /
   'vivakṣā tatparatvena' iti dvitīyoddyotamūlodāharaṇebhyaḥ saṃkaratrayaṃ	avivakzA tad paratvena a iti dvitIya uddyota mUla udAharaNeByaH saMkara trayam
   saṃsṛṣṭiśca labhyata eva /	saMsRzwiH ca laByate eva /
   'calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭim' ityatra hi rūpakavyatirekasya prāgvyākhyātasya	acala apAFgAm dRzwim a iti atra hi rUpakavya tirekasya prAc vyAKyAtasya
   śṛṅgārānugrāhakatvaṃ svabhāvokteḥ śṛṅgārasya caikānupraveśaḥ /	SRFgAra anugrAhaka tvam svaBAva ukteH SRFgArasya ca eka anupraveSaH /
   'uppaha jāyā' iti gāthāyāṃ pāmarasvabhāvoktirvā dhvanirveti	auppaha jAyAa iti gATAyAm pAmara svaBAva uktiH vA DvaniH vA iti
   prakaraṇādyabhāve ekataragrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti /	prakaraNa Adi aBAve ekatara grAhakam pramANam na asti /
   yadyapyalaṅkāro rasamavaśyamanugṛhṇāti, tathāpi 'nāti nirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti	yadi api alaFkAraH rasam avaSyam anugRhNAti, taTA api anAti nirvahaNa ezitA a iti
   yadabhiprāyeṇoktaṃ tatra saṅkārāsambhavātsaṃsṛṣṭirevālaṅkārema rasadhvaneḥ	yat aBiprAyeNa uktam tatra saFkAra asamBavAt saMsRzwiH eva alaFkArema rasa DvaneH
   yathā  'bāhulatikāpāśena baddhvā dṛḍham' ityatra /	yaTA   abAhu latikA pASena badDvA dRXam a iti atra /
   prabhedāntarāṇāmapīti /	praBeda antarANAm api iti /
   rasādidhvanivyatiriktānām /	rasa Adi Dvani vyatiriktAnAm /
   bālapriyā suhṛtvasākṣitvayoracetaneṣu latāveśmasu	bAla priyA suhRtu a sA akzi tvayoH acetanezu latA veSmasu
   bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena sākṣipadamāsannatvena rūpeṇa ca lakṣayati /	bADAt suhRd padam upakAri tvena sAkzi padam Asanna tvena rUpeNa ca lakzayati /
   upakārādigatātiśayo vyaṅgyaścetyanayoḥ padayordhvanirityarthaḥ /	upakAra Adi gata atiSayaH vyaFgyaH ca iti anayoH padayA UrDva niH iti arTaH /
   padenābhivyakta iti sambandhaḥ /	padena aBivyaktaH iti sambanDaH /
   guṇatvamiti /	guNa tvam iti /
   vācyaṃ pratīta śeṣaḥ /	vAcyam pratIta SezaH /
   vācyālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvamityatrālaṅkāre vācyatvaviśeṣaṇasya phalaṃ	vAcya alaFkAra saFkIrNa tvam iti atra alaFkAre vAcya tva viSezaNasya Palam
   darśayati  vyaṅgyatva ityādi /	darSayati   vyaFgyatvaH ityAdi /
   uktabhedāṣṭaka iti /	ukta Beda azwakaH iti /
   saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭikṛtabhedāṣṭaka ityarthaḥ /	saFkara saMsRzwi kRta Beda azwakaH iti arTaH /
   evaṃvidhamiti /	evaMviDam iti /
   rasavatsālaṅkāraṃ cetyarthaḥ /	rasavat sa alaFkAram ca iti arTaH /
   suvyavasthitatvaṃ darśayati  vivakṣetyādi /	su vyavasTita tvam darSayati  vivakzA ityAdi /
   śṛṅgārānugrāhakatvamiti /	SRFgAra anugrAhaka tvam iti /
   śṛṅgāreṇa sahānugrāhyanugrāhakabhāva ityarthaḥ /	SRFgAreNa saha anugrAhi anugrAhaka BAvaH iti arTaH /
   nāyakāntaragatatattacceṣṭādarśanasya ratyuddīpakatvāditi bhāvaḥ /	nAyaka antara gata tad tad cezwA darSanasya rati uddIpaka tvAt iti BAvaH /
   iti gāthāyāmiti /	iti gATAyAm iti /
   pūrvodāhṛtāyāmiti śeṣaḥ /	pUrva udAhRtAyAm iti SezaH /
   prakaraṇādyabhāva iti nimitte saptamī /	prakaraNa Adi aBAvaH iti nimitte saptamI /
   evaṃ trividhasya vācyālaṅkārasaṅkarasyodāharaṇaṃ pradarśya,	evam triviDasya vAcya alaFkAra saFkarasya udAharaNam pradarSya,
   tatsaṃsṛṣṭerviṣayamudāharaṇaṃ ca darśayiṣyannāha  yadyapītyādi /	tad saMsRzweH vizayam udAharaNam ca darSayizyan= Aha  yadi api ityAdi /
   yadabhiprāyeṇeta /	yat aBiprAyeNa ita /
   anugrāhakatvābhāvābhiprāyeṇetyarthaḥ /	anugrAhaka tva aBAva aBiprAyeNa iti arTaH /
   ityatreti /	iti atra iti /
   atra hi rūpakeṇa rasasya saṃsṛṣṭirevetyarthaḥ /	atra hi rUpakeNa rasasya saMsRzwiH eva iti arTaH /
   vakṣyamāṇopapātyarthamāha  niṣpādanetyādi /	vakzyamANa upapAtyarTam Aha   nizpAdana ityAdi /
   vyāpāravatītyādīni padāni vivṛṇoti  tatretyādinā /	vyApAravatI ityAdIni padAni vivRNoti   tatra ityAdinA /
   yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācatkavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭiryā	yA vyApAravatI rasAn rasayitum kAcat kavInAm navA dRzwiH yA
   pariniṣṭhitārthaviṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /	parinizWita arTa vizaya unmezA ca vEpaScitI /
   locanam vyāpāravatīta /	locanam vyApAravatIta /
   niṣpādanaprāṇo hi rasa ityuktam /	nizpAdana prANaH hi rasaH iti uktam /
   tatra vibhāvādiyojanātmikāvarṇanā, tataḥ prabhṛti ghaṭanāparyantā kriyā	tatra viBAva Adi yojana AtmikA varNanA, tatas praBRti GawanA paryantA kriyA
   vyāpāraḥ, tena satatayuktā /	vyApAraH, tena satata yuktAH /
   rasāniti /	rasAn iti /
   rasyamānatāsārān sthāyibhāvān rasayituṃ rasyamānatāpattiyogyān kartum /	rasyamAna tA sArAn sTAyi BAvAn rasayitum rasyamAna tA Apatti yogyAn kartum /
   kāciditi lokavārtāpatitabodhāvasthātyāgenonmīlantī /	kAcid iti loka vArtA patita boDa avasTA tyAgena unmIlantI /
   ata eva te kavayaḥ varṇanāyogāt teṣām /	atas eva te kavayaH varNanA yogAt tezAm /
   naveti /	nava iti /
   kṣaṇekṣaṇe nūtanairnūtanairvaicitryairjagantyāsūtrayantī /	kzaNa IkzaNe nUta nEH nUtanEH vEcitryEH jagantyAsUtrayantI /
   dṛṣṭiriti /	dRzwiH iti /
   pratibhārūpā, tatra dṛṣṭiścākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ ṣāḍavādi rasayatīti	pratiBA rUpA, tatra dRzwiH cAkzuzam jQAnam zAxava Adi rasayati iti
   virodhālaṅkāro 'ta eva navā /	viroDa alaFkAraH atas eva navAH /
   tadanugṛhītaśca dhvaniḥ, tathāhi cākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ	tad anugRhItaH ca DvaniH, taTA hi cAkzuzam jQAnam
   nāvivakṣitamatyantamasambhavā bhāvāt /	na avivakzitam atyantam asamBavAH BAvAt /
   na cānyaparam; api tvarthāntare aindriyakavijñānābhyāsollasite	na ca anya param; api tu arTa antare Endriyaka vi jQAna aByAsa ullasite
   pratibhānalakṣaṇe 'rthe saṃkrāntam /	pratiBAna lakzaNe arTe saMkrAntam /
   saṃkramaṇe ca virodho 'nugrāhaka eva /	saMkramaNe ca viroDaH anugrAhakaH eva /
   tadvakṣyati  'virodhālaṅkāreṇa' ityādinā /	tat vakzyati   aviroDa alaFkAreNa a ityAdinA /
   bālapriyā vibhāvādīta /	bAla priyA viBAva AdIta /
   vibhāvānubhāvadyarthetyarthaḥ /	viBAva anuBAva di arTa iti arTaH /
   ghaṭaneti /	GawanA iti /
   tattatpadasaṅghaṭanetyarthaḥ /	tad tad pada saFGawanA iti arTaH /
   kriyeta /	kriyeta /
   tattadanusandhānātmikā manaḥkriyetyarthaḥ /	tad tad anusanDAna AtmikA manaH kriyA iti arTaH /
   nityayoge batubityāha  tenetyādi /	nitya yoge batu biti Aha   tena ityAdi /
   yuktatvaṃ janyajanakabhāvasambandhena bodhyam /	yukta tvam janya janaka BAva sambanDena boDyam /
   rasānityasya vācyārthavivaraṇam  rasyamānatāsārāniti /	rasa anityasya vAcya arTa vivaraNam  rasyamAna tA sArAn iti /
   rasapadena prakṛte vivakṣitamāha  sthāyibhāvāniti /	rasa padena prakRte vivakzita mAha   sTAyi BAvAn iti /
   lokayātrāpatitabodheti /	lokayAtrApatita boDA iti /
   laukikatattadvastuviṣayakajñānetyarthaḥ /	lOkika tad tad vastu vizaya ka jQAnA iti arTaH /
   ata eveti /	atas eva iti /
   dṛṣṭyunmīlanādevetyarthaḥ /	dRzwi unmIlanAdA iva iti arTaH /
   kavipadayogārthamāha  vaṇenāyogāditi /	kavi pada yoga arTam Aha  vaNena ayogAt iti /
   āsūtrayantī prakāśayantī /	AsUtrayantI prakASayantI /
   vakṣyamāṇaṃ saṅkramaṇaṃ manasi kṛtyāha  pratibhārūpeti /	vakzyamANam saFkramaNam manasi kRtyA aha   pratiBA rUpA iti /
   atra dṛṣṭiścākṣuvajñānam /	atra dRzwiH cAkzuva jQAnam /
   rasān rasayituṃ ṣāḍabādipeyadravyāṇi madhurādirasayuktāni kartum	rasAn rasayitum zAxabAdi peya dravyANi maDura Adi rasa yuktAni kartum
   yadvā  ṣāḍabādigatamadhurādirasānāsvādayituṃ vyāpāravatīti viruddhārthasya	yat vA  zAxabAdi gata maDura Adi rasAn AsvAdayitum vyApAravatI iti virudDa arTasya
   pratītyā virodhābhāsālaṅkāra ityāha  tatra dṛṣṭirityādi /	pratItyA viroDa ABAsa alaFkAraH iti Aha   tatra dRzwiH ityAdi /
   virodhadyotakamāha  ata evetyādi /	viroDa dyotakam Aha  ataH eva ityAdi /
   naveti virodhadyotakamiti bhāvaḥ /	navA iti viroDa dyotakam iti BAvaH /
   dhvaniḥ dṛṣṭirittayarthāntarasaṅkramitavācyadhvaniḥ /	DvaniH dRzwiH ittayarTa antara saFkramita vAcya DvaniH /
   nāvivakṣitamatyantamiti /	na avivakzitam atyantam iti /
   atyantatiraskṛtaṃ netyarthaḥ /	atyanta tiraskRtam na iti arTaH /
   asambhavābhāvāditi /	asamBava aBAvAt iti /
   kavigatasya candrodyānādicākṣuṣajñānasyāpi rasaniṣpādanopayogitvāditi	kavi gatasya candra udyAna Adi cAkzuza jQAnasya api rasa nizpAdana upayogi tvAt iti
   bhāvaḥ /	BAvaH /
   na cānyaparamiti /	na ca anya param iti /
   vyaṅgyaparaṃ vivakṣitaṃ ca netyarthaḥ /	vyaFgya param vivakzitam ca na iti arTaH /
   apitu pratibhānalakṣaṇe arthāntare saṅkrāntamiti /	api tu pratiBAna lakzaNe arTa antare saFkrAntam iti /
   dṛṣṭipadamatra pratibhātvena rūpeṇa jñānaṃ lakṣayatītyarthaḥ /	dRzwi padam atra pratiBA tvena rUpeNa jQAnam lakzayati iti arTaH /
   pratibhānasyātasphuṭatvādikamatra vyaṅgyam /	pratiBAnasya Ata sPuwa tva Adikam atra vyaFgyam /
   mukhyārthasambandhaṃ darśayitumāha  aindriyaketyādi /	muKya arTa sambanDam darSayitum Aha  A Endriyaka ityAdi /
   aindriyakaṃ vijñānaṃ laukikatattadviṣayakacākṣuṣajñānaṃ tasyābhyāsa	Endriyakam vijQAnam lOkika tad tad vizaya kacAkzuza jQAnam tasya aByAsa
   āvṛttiḥ tenollasite prakāśite ityarthaḥ /	AvRttiH tena ullasite prakASite iti arTaH /
   uktamarthaṃ vṛttyā saṅgamayati  tadvakṣyatītyādi /	uktam arTam vRttyA saFgamayati  tat vakzyati ityAdi /
   te dve apyavalambya viśvamaniśa nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva ca	te dve api avalambya viSvam aniSa nirvarNayantaH vayam SrAntAH na eva ca
   labdhamabdhiśayana tvadbhaktitulyaṃ sukham //	labDam abDiSayana tvad Bakti tulyam suKam //
   locanam yā caivaṃvidhā dṛṣṭiḥ pariniṣṭito 'calaḥ arthaviṣaye niścetavye	locanam yA ca evaMviDA dRzwiH parinizwitaH acalaH arTa vizaye niScetavye
   viṣaye unmeṣo yasyāḥ /	vizaye unmezaH yasyAH /
   tathā pariniṣṭhite lokaprasiddhe 'rthe na tu kavivadapūrvasminnarthe	taTA parinizWite loka prasidDe arTe na tu kavi vat apUrvasmin= arTe
   unmeṣo yasyāḥ sā /	unmezaH yasyAH sA /
   vipaścitāmiyaṃ vaipaścitī /	vipaScitAm iyam vEpaScitI /
   te avalambyeti /	te avalambya iti /
   kavīnāmiti vaipaścitīti vacanena nāhaṃ kavirna paṇḍita ityātmano	kavInAm iti vEpaSciti iti vacanena na aham kaviH na paNxitaH iti AtmanaH 
   'nauddhatyaṃ dhvanyate /	anOdDatyam Dvanyate /
   anātmīyamapi daridragṛha ivopakaraṇatayānyata āhṛtametanmayā	anAtmIyam api daridra gRhaH iva upakaraNa tayA anyatas AhRtam etat mayA
   dṛṣṭidvayamityarthaḥ /	dRzwi dvayam iti arTaH /
   te dve apīti /	te dve api iti /
   na hyekayā dṛṣṭyā samyaṅnirvarṇanaṃ nirvahati /	na hi ekayA dRzwyA samyak nirvarNanam nirvahati /
   viśvamityaśeṣam /	viSvam iti aSezam /
   aniśamiti /	aniSam iti /
   punaḥ punaranavaratam /	punar punar anavaratam /
   nirvarṇayanto varṇanayā, tathā niścitārthaṃ varṇayantaḥ idamitthamiti	nirvarNayantaH varNanayA, taTA niScita arTam varNayantaH idam itTam iti
   parāmarśanumānādinānirbhajya nirvarṇanaṃ kimatra sāraṃ syāditi	parAmarSa nu mAna AdinA nirBajya nirvarNanam kim atra sAram syAt iti
   tilaśastilaśo vicayanam /	tilaSas ti laSas vicayanam /
   yacca nirvarṇyate tatkhalu madhye vyāpāryamāṇayā madhye cārthaviśeṣu	yat ca nirvarNyate tat Kalu maDye vyApAryamANayA maDye ca arTa viSezu
   niścitonmeṣayā niścalayā dṛṣṭyā samyaṅnirvarṇitaṃ bhavati /	niScita unmezayA niScalayA dRzwyA samyak nirvarNitam Bavati /
   vayamiti /	vayam iti /
   mithyātatvadṛṣṭyāharaṇavyasanina ityarthaḥ /	miTyAta tva dRzwi AharaNa vyasaninaH iti arTaH /
   śrāntā iti /	SrAntAH iti /
   na kevalaṃ sāraṃ na labdhaṃ yāvatpratyuta khedaḥ prāpta iti bhāvaḥ /	na kevalam sAram na labDam yAvat pratyuta KedaH prAptaH iti BAvaH /
   caśabdastuśabdasyārthe /	caSabdaH tuSabdasya arTe /
   abdhiśayaneti /	abDiSayanA iti /
   yoganidrayā tvamata eva sārasvarūpavedī svarūpāvasthita ityarthaḥ /	yoganidrayA tvam atas eva sAra svarUpa vedI svarUpa avasTitaH iti arTaH /
   śrāntasya śayanasthitaṃ prati bahumāno bhavati /	SrAntasya Sayana sTitam prati bahu mAnaH Bavati /
   tvadbhaktīti /	tvad BaktI iti /
   tvameva paramātmasvarūpoviśvasārastasya bhaktiḥ śraddhādipūrvaka	tvam eva paramAtma svarUpaH viSva sAraH tasya BaktiH SradDA Adi pUrvaka
   upāsanākramajastadāveśastena bālapriyā arthaviṣaya	upAsana Akrama jaH tad AveSaH tena bAla priyAH arTa vizaya
   ityasyārthamāha  niścetavya ityādi /	iti asya arTam Aha   niScetavyaH ityAdi /
   anyathāpi vyācaṣṭe  tathetyādi /	anyaTA api vyAcazwe  taTA ityAdi /
   te avalambyetyanena dhvanitamarthamuktvā tadvācyārthamāha  anātmīyamityādi	te avalambya iti anena Dvanitam arTam uktvA tad vAcya arTam Aha  anAtmIyam ityAdi
   gṛha iveti /	gRhaH iva iti /
   avidyamānaṃ maṇḍanādikamiti śeṣaḥ /	avidyamAnam maNxana Adikam iti SezaH /
   dve apītyukteḥ phalamāha  na hītyādi /	dve api iti ukteH Palam Aha  na hi ityAdi /
   aniśamityasyārthadvayamāha  punarityādi /	aniSam iti asya arTa dvayam Aha   punar ityAdi /
   kavidṛṣṭyavalambanena nirvarṇanaṃ dvedhā vivṛṇoti  nirvarṇayanto	kavi dRzwi avalambanena nirvarNanam dveDA vivRNoti   nirvarNayantaH 
   varṇanayeti /	varNanayA iti /
   tathetyādīti ca /	taTA ityAdi iti ca /
   varṇanayā nirvarṇayanto vīkṣamāṇāḥ /	varNanayAH nirvarNayantaH vIkzamANAH /
   vipaściddṛṣṭyavalambanena nirvarṇanaṃ vyākhyāti  idamitthamityādi /	vipaScit dRzwi avalambanena nirvarNanam vyAKyAti   idam itTam ityAdi /
   nirbhajya nirvarṇanameva sphuṭayati  kimatretyādi /	nirBajya nirvarNanam eva sPuwa yati   kim atra ityAdi /
   dṛṣṭidvayālambanena nirvarṇanasya phalam  na hyekayetyādi /	dRzwi dvaya Alambanena nirvarNanasya Palam  na hi ekayA ityAdi /
   pūrvoktameva viśadayati  yaccetyādi /	pUrva uktam eva viSada yati   yat ca ityAdi /
   vayamityasya bhāvārthamāha  mithyetyādi /	vayam iti asya BAva arTam Aha  miTyA ityAdi /
   mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kavidṛṣṭiḥ tatvadṛṣṭiḥ vipaściddṛṣṭiḥ,	miTyAdRzwiH kavi dRzwiH tatvadRzwiH vipaScit dRzwiH,
   tayorāhabhāvārthamāha  mithyetyādi /	tayorAha BAva arTam Aha  miTyA ityAdi /
   mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kavidṛṣṭiḥ tatvadṛṣṭiḥ vipaściddṛṣṭiḥ tayorāṇe	miTyAdRzwiH kavi dRzwiH tatvadRzwiH vipaScit dRzwiH tayorANe
   vyasaninastātparyavanta ityarthaḥ /	vyasaninaH tAt paryavantaH iti arTaH /
   tuśabdasyārtha iti /	tuSabdasya arTaH iti /
   viśeṣarūpārthabodhaka ityarthaḥ /	viSeza rUpa arTa boDakaH iti arTaH /
   abdhiśayanetyasya gamyārthamāha  yoganidrayetyādi /	abDiSayana iti asya gamya arTam Aha   yoga nidrayA ityAdi /
   ata eveti /	atas eva iti /
   tvadbhaktitulyasya sukhasyābhāvādevetyarthaḥ /	tvad Bakti tulyasya suKasya aBAvAt eva iti arTaH /
   sāreti /	sAra iti /
   viśvasārabhūtaṃ yatsvasvarūpaṃ tadvedītyarthaḥ /	viSvasAra BUtam yat sva svarUpam tat vedI iti arTaH /
   vyaṅgyāntaraṃ ca darśayati  āntasyetyādi /	vyaFgya antaram ca darSayati   Antasya ityAdi /
   tadāveśa iti /	tad AveSaH iti /
   tadviṣayakapremātiśaya ityarthaḥ /	tad vizayaka prema atiSayaH iti arTaH /
   yadvā  antaḥkaraṇavṛttestadākārākāritatvamityarthaḥ /	yat vA  antaHkaraNa vRtteH tad AkAra AkArita tvam iti arTaH /
   bhakteḥ svarūpaṃ ityatra virodhālaṅkāreṇārthāntarasaṃkramitavācyasya	BakteH svarUpam iti atra viroDa alaFkAreNa arTa antara saMkramita vAcyasya
   dhvaniprabhedasya saṅkīrṇatvam /	Dvani praBedasya saFkIrNa tvam /
   vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca padāpekṣayaiva /	vAcya alaFkAra saMsRzwa tvam ca pada apekzayA eva /
   yatra hi kānicitpadāni locanam tulyamapi na labdhamāstāṃ tāvattajjātīyam /	yatra hi kAnicid padAni locanam tulyam api na labDam AstAm tAvat tat jAtIyam /
   evaṃ prathamameva parameśvarabhaktibhājaḥ	evam praTamam eva parameSvara Bakti BAjaH
   kutūhalamātrāvalambitakaviprāmāṇikobhayavṛtteḥ punarapi	kutUhala mAtrOvalambitaka viprAmANika uBaya vRtteH punar api
   parameśvarabhaktiviśrāntireva yukteti manvānasyeyamuktiḥ /	parameSvara Bakti viSrAntiH eva yuktA iti manvAnasyeya muktiH /
   sakalapramāṇapariniścitadṣṭādṛṣṭaviṣayaviśeṣajaṃ yatsukhaṃ, yadapi vā	sakala pramANa pariniScita dzwAdRzwa vizaya viSeza jam yat suKaM, yat api vA
   lokottaraṃ rasacarvaṇātmakaṃ tata ubhayato 'pi parameśvaraviśrāntyānandaḥ	loka uttaram rasa carvaNa Atmakam tatas uBayatas api parameSvara viSrAnti AnandaH
   prakṛṣyate tadānandavipruṇmātrāvabhāso hi rasāsvāda ityuktaṃ prāgasmābhiḥ	prakRzyate tad Ananda vipruz mAtra avaBAsaH hi rasa AsvAdaH iti uktam prAk asmABiH
   laukikaṃ tu sukhaṃ tato 'pi nikṛṣṭaprāyaṃ bahutaraduḥkhānuṣaṅgāditi	lOkikam tu suKam tatas api nikRzwa prAyam bahutara duHKa anuzaFgAt iti
   tātparyam /	tAtparyam /
   tatraiva dṛṣṭiśabdāpekṣayaikapadānupraveśaḥ /	tatra eva dRzwi Sabda apekzayA eka pada anupraveSaH /
   dṛṣṭimavalambya nirvarṇanamiti virodhālaṅkāro vāśrīyatām, andhapadanyāsena	dRzwim avalambya nirvarNanam iti viroDa alaFkAraH vA aSrIyatAm, anDa pada nyAsena
   dṛṣṭiśabdo 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo vāstu ityekataraniścaye nāsti pramāṇam,	dRzwi SabdaH atyanta tiraskRta vAcyaH vA astu iti ekatara niScaye na asti pramANam,
   prakāradvayenāpi hṛdyatvāt /	prakAra dvayena api hRdya tvAt /
   na ca pūrvatrāpyevaṃ vācyam /	na ca pUrvatra api evam vAcyam /
   navāśabdena śabdaśaktyanuraṇanatayā virodhasya sarvathāvalambanāt /	navA Sabdena Sabda Sakti anuraNana tayA viroDasya sarvaTA avalambanAt /
   evaṃ saṅkaraṃ trividhamudāhṛtya saṃsṛṣṭimudāharati  vācyeti /	evam saFkaram triviDam udAhRtya saMsRzwim udAha rati  vAcyA iti /
   sakalavākye hi yadyalaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi pradhānaṃ	sakala vAkye hi yadi alaFkAraH api vyaFgya arTaH api vyaFgya arTaH api praDAnam
   tadānugrāhyanugrāhakatvasaṅkarastadabhāve tvasaṅgatirityalaṅkāreṇa	tadA anugrAhi anugrAhaka tva saFkaraH tad aBAve tu asaFgatiH iti alaFkAreNa
   bālapriyā tasya paramānandarūpatvaṃ ca bhaktirasāyanādigrantheṣu	bAla priyA tasya parama Ananda rUpa tvam ca Bakti rasAyana Adi granTezu
   pradarśitam /	pradarSitam /
   ślokasyāsyāvatārikāmāha  evamityādi /	Slokasya asya avatArikA mAha  evam ityAdi /
   evamiyamuktiriti sambandhaḥ /	evam iya muktiH iti sambanDaH /
   ślokasyāsya pāryantikaṃ tātparyārthamāha  sakaletyādi /	Slokasya asya pAryantikam tAtparya arTam Aha  sakala ityAdi /
   vṛttau saṅkīrṇatvamityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraḥ	vRttO saFkIrNa tvam iti anena anugrAhya anugrAhaka BAvena saFkaraH
   ekapadānupraveśaśaṅkaraśca vivakṣita iti darśayati  tatretyādi /	eka pada anupraveSa SaFkaraH ca vivakzitaH iti darSayati  tatra ityAdi /
   tatraiva uktaśloka eva /	tatra eva ukta SlokaH eva /
   ekapadānupraveśa iti /	eka pada anupraveSaH iti /
   virodhālaṅkāreṇa sahārthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasya dhvaneriti śeṣa  /	viroDa alaFkAreNa saha arTa antara saFkramita vAcyasya DvaneH iti Seza /
   sandehasaṅkaramapyatra darśayati  dṛṣṭimavalambyetyādi /	sandeha saFkaram api atra darSayati  dRzwim avalambya ityAdi /
   virodhālaṅkāro veti /	viroDa alaFkAraH vA iti /
   te avalambya nirvarṇayanta ityatra te iti tatpadena dṛṣṭipadavācyārthasya	te avalambya nirvarNayantaH iti atra te iti tad padena dRzwi pada vAcya arTasya
   darśanasya parāmarśe darśanamavalambya paśyanta iti viruddhārthasya	darSanasya parAmarSe darSanam avalambya paSyante iti virudDa arTasya
   pratītyā virodhālaṅkāro vetyarthaḥ /	pratItyA viroDa alaFkAraH vA iti arTaH /
   vakṣyamāṇamarthamādāyātra virodhaparihāraḥ /	vakzyamANam arTam AdAya atra viroDa parihAraH /
   andhetyādi /	anDA ityAdi /
   niḥśvāsāndha ityādāvandhādipadenevātyantatiraskṛtavācyena dṛṣṭipadena	niHSvAsa anDaH iti AdO= anDa Adi padena iva atyanta tiraskRta vAcyena dRzwi padena
   lakṣyasya pratibhārūpārthasya parāmarśe 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo	lakzyasya pratiBA rUpArTasya parAmarSe atyanta tiraskRta vAcyaH 
   dhvanirvetyarthaḥ /	DvaniH vA iti arTaH /
   pūrvatrāpīti /	pUrvatra api iti /
   yā dṛṣṭiḥ rasān rasayituṃ vyāpāravatītyatrāpītyarthaḥ /	yA dRzwiH rasAn rasayitum vyApAravatI iti atra api iti arTaH /
   evamiti /	evam iti /
   sandehasaṅkara ityarthaḥ /	sandeha saFkaraH iti arTaH /
   navetyādi /	nava ityAdi /
   navāśabdenāvalambanāditi sambandhaḥ /	navA Sabdena avalambanAt iti sambanDaH /
   naveti śabdena dyotanādityarthaḥ /	nava iti Sabdena dyotanAt iti arTaH /
   śabdaśaktyanuraṇanatayeti viśeṣaṇe tṛtīyā /	Sabda Sakti anuraNa natayA iti viSezaNe tRtIyA /
   udāharatīti /	udAharati iti /
   darśayatītyarthaḥ /	darSayati iti arTaH /
   sakalavākya iti /	sakala vAkyaH iti /
   sampūrṇavākya ityarthaḥ /	sampUrNa vAkyaH iti arTaH /
   vācyālaṅkārabhāñji kānicicca dhvaniprabhedayuktani /	vAcya alaFkAra BAQji kAnicid ca Dvani praBeda yuktani /
   yathā   dīrdhīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu	yaTA  dIrDIkurvan pawu mada kalam kUjitam sArasAnAm pratyUzezu
   sphuṭitakamalāmodamaittrīkaṣāyaḥ /	sPuwita kamala Amoda mEttrI kazAyaH /
   locanam vā dhvaninā vā paryāyeṇa dvābhyāmapi vā yugapatpadaviśrāntābhyāṃ	locanam vA DvaninA vA paryAyeNa dvAByAm api vA yugapad pada viSrAntAByAm
   bhāvyamiti trayo bhedāḥ /	BAvyam iti trayaH BedAH /
   etadgarbhīkṛtya sāvadhāraṇamāha  padāpekṣayaiveti /	etat garBIkRtya sa avaDAraNam Aha  pada apekzayA eva iti /
   yatrānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ pratyāśaṅkāpi nāvatarati taṃ tṛtīyameva	yatra anugrAhya anugrAhaka BAvam pratyASaFkA api na avatarati tam tRtIyam eva
   prakāramudāhartumupakramate  yatra hīti /	prakAram udAhartum upakramate  yatra hi iti /
   yasmādyatra kānicidalaṅkārabhāñji kāniciddhvaniyuktāni, yathā	yasmAt yatra kAnicid alaFkAra BAQji kAnicid Dvani yuktAni, yaTA
   dīrdhīkurvannityatreti /	dIrDIkurvan= iti atra iti /
   tathāvidhapadāpekṣayaiva vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvamityāvṛtyā pūrvagranthena	taTAviDa pada apekzayA eva vAcya alaFkAra saMsRzwa tvam iti AvRtyA pUrva granTena
   sambandhaḥ kartavyaḥ /	sambanDaH kartavyaH /
   atra hīti /	atra hi iti /
   atratyo hiśabdo maitrīpadamityasyānantaraṃ yojya iti grantha saṅgatiḥ /	atratyaH hi SabdaH mEtrI padam iti asya anantaram yojyaH iti granTa saFgatiH /
   dīrghīkurvanniti /	dIrGIkurvan= iti /
   siprāvātena hi dūramapyasau śabdo nīyate, tathā	siprA vAtena hi dUram api asO SabdaH nIyate, taTA
   sukumārapavanasparśajātaharṣāḥ ciraṃ kūjanti, tatkūjitaṃ ca	sukumAra pavana sparSa jAta harzAH ciram kUjanti, tat kUjitam ca
   vātāndolitasiprātaraṅgajamadhuraśabdamiśraṃ bhavatīti dīrghatvam /	vAta Andolita siprA taraFga ja maDura Sabda miSram Bavati iti dIrGa tvam /
   paṭviti /	pawu iti /
   tathāsau sukumāro vāyuryena tajjaḥ śabdaḥ sārasakūjitamapi nābhibhavati	taTA asO sukumAraH vAyuH yena tad jaH SabdaH sArasa kUjitam api na aBiBavati
   pratyuta tatsabrahmacārī tadeva dīpayati /	pratyuta tad sabrahmacArI tat eva dIpayati /
   na ca dīpanaṃ tadīyamanupayogi yatastanmadena kalaṃ madhuramākarṇanīyam /	na ca dIpanam tadIyam anupayogi yatas tad madena kalam maDuram AkarNanIyam /
   pratyūṣeṣviti /	pratyUzezu iti /
   prabhātasya tathāvidhasevāvasaratvam /	praBAtasya taTAviDa sevA avasara tvam /
   bahuvacanaṃ sadaiva tatraiṣā hṛdyateti nirūpayati /	bahuvacanam sadA eva tatra ezA hRdyatA iti nirUpayati /
   sphuṭitānyantarvartamānamakarandabhareṇa /	sPuwitAni antar vartamAna makaranda BareNa /
   bālapriyā tadabhāva iti /	bAla priyA tad aBAvaH iti /
   tatsaṅkarābhāva ityarthaḥ /	tad saFkara aBAvaH iti arTaH /
   paryāyeṇeti /	paryAyeNa iti /
   padaviśrāntena bhāvyamiti śeṣaḥ /	pada viSrAntena BAvyam iti SezaH /
   tṛtīyameveti /	tRtIyam eva iti /
   dvābhyāmapi yugapat padaviśrāntābhyāṃ bhāvyamityuktamevetyarthaḥ.	dvAByAm api yugapad pada viSrAntAByAm BAvyam iti uktam eva iti arTaH.
   'yatre'tyādivākyaṃ saṅgamayati  yasmādityādi /	ayatre atyAdi vAkyam saFgamayati  yasmAt ityAdi /
   yasmāditi hiśabdārtha kathanam /	yasmAt iti hi Sabda arTa kaTanam /
   āvṛtyeti /	AvRtya iti /
   vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatatvaṃ padāpekṣayaiveti padānāmāvṛttiḥ tatra	vAcya alaFkAra saMsRzwa tatvam pada apekzayA eva iti padAnAm AvRttiH tatra
   padāpekṣayetyasya tathāvidhapadāpekṣayetyarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /	pada apekzayA iti asya taTAviDa pada apekzayA iti arTaH ca iti BAvaH /
   idamupalakṣaṇaṃ tatreti śeṣaśca bodhyaḥ /	idam upalakzaNam tatra iti SezaH ca boDyaH /
   dīrghīkuvannityanenoktaṃ siprāvātahetukaṃ kūjitasya dīrghatvaṃ daiśikaṃ	dIrGIku vat = iti anena uktam siprA vAta hetukam kUjitasya dIrGa tvam dESikam
   kālikaṃ svasajātīyasaṃvalanakṛtaṃ ceti trividhamiti	kAlikam svasa jAtIya saMvalana kRtam ca iti triviDam iti
   vivṛṇoti  saprāvātenetyādi dīrghatvamityantena /	vivRNoti   sa prAvAtena ityAdi dIrGa tvam iti antena /
   paṭu samarthaṃ dīrghīkurvannitiṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇamityabhiprāyeṇa	pawu samarTam dIrGIkurvan= itim kriyA viSezaNam iti aBiprAyeNa
   vyācaṣṭe  tathetyādi /	vyAcazwe  taTA ityAdi /
   sukumāraḥ mandaḥ /	sukumAraH mandaH /
   dīpayati poṣayati yatastanmadhuramato nānupayogīnti sambandhaḥ /	dIpayati pozayati yatas tad maDuram atas na anupayogInti sambanDaH /
   tathāvidhaseveti /	taTAviDa sevA iti /
   sarataglāniharaṇādirūpasevetyarthaḥ /	sarata glA ni haraNa Adi rUpa sevA iti arTaH /
   tatreti /	tatra iti /
   ujjayinyāmityarthaḥ /	ujjayinyAm iti arTaH /
   nirūpayati darśayati /	nirUpayati darSayati /
   sphuṭitānītyasya truṭitānītyarthaṃ manasivṛtya tatra hetuṃ gamyaṃ	sPuwitAni iti asya truwitAni iti arTam manasivRtya tatra hetum gamyam
   darśayati  antarityādi /	darSayati  antar ityAdi /
   sphuṭitānītyanenārthāntaraṃ ca vicakṣitamityāha  tathetyādi /	sPuwitAni iti anena arTa antaram ca vicakzitam iti Aha   taTA ityAdi /
   yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānimaṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva	yatra strINAm harati surata glAnim aFga anukUlaH siprAvAtaH priyatamaH iva
   prārthanācāṭukāraḥ //	prArTanA cAwu kAraH //
   locanam tathā sphuṭitāni vikasitāni nayanahārīṇi yāni kamalāni teṣāṃ ya	locanam taTA sPuwitAni vikasitAni nayana hArINi yAni kamalAni tezAm ya
   āmodastena yā maitrī abhyāsāṅgāviyogaparasparānukūlyalābhastena kaṣāya	Ama udaH tena yA mEtrI aByAsa aFga aviyoga paraspara anukUlya lABaH tena kazAya
   uparakto makarandena ca kaṣāyavarṇīkṛtaḥ /	uparaktaH makarandena ca kazAya varNIkRtaH /
   strīṇāmiti /	strINAm iti /
   sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokyasārabhūtasya ya evaṃ karoti suratakṛtāṃ	sarvasya taTAviDasya trElokya sAra BUtasya yaH evam karoti surata kRtAm
   glāniṃ tāntiṃ harati, atha ca tadviṣayāṃ glāniṃ punaḥ	glAnim tAntim harati, aTa ca tad vizayAm glAnim punar 
   sambhogābhilāṣoddīpanena harati /	samBoga aBilAza uddIpanena harati /
   na ca prasahyaprabhutatayāpi tvaṅgānukūlo hyadyasparśaḥ hṛdayāntarbhūtaśca	na ca prasahya praButatayA api tu aFga anukUlaH hi adya sparSaH hRdaya antarBUtaH ca
   priyatame tadviṣaye prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni kārayati /	priyatame tad vizaye prArTanA arTam cAwUni kArayati /
   priyatamo 'pi tatpavanasparśaprabuddhasambhogābhilāṣaḥ /	priyatamaH api tad pavana sparSa prabudDa samBoga aBilAzaH /
   prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni karotīti tena tathā kāryata iti	prArTanA arTam cAwUni karoti iti tena taTA kAryate iti
   parasparānurāgaprāṇaśṛṅgārasarvasvabhūto 'sau pavanaḥ /	paraspara anurAga prANa SRFgAra sarvasva BUtaH asO pavanaH /
   yuktaṃ caitattasya yataḥ siprāparicito 'sau vāta iti nāgariko na	yuktam ca etat tasya yatas siprA paricitaH asO vAtaH iti nAgarikaH na
   tvavidagdho bālapriyā bhāvārthamāha  nayaneti /	tu avidagDaH bAla priyA BAva arTam Aha  nayanA iti /
   maitrīpadamukhyārthasyātra bādhāttatpadena vivakṣitaṃ	mEtrI pada muKya arTasya atra bADAt tad padena vivakzitam
   darśayati  abhyāsaṅgetyādi /	darSayati   aByAsaFga ityAdi /
   abhyāsaṅgasya saṃśleṣasyāviyogo 'vicchedaḥ avicchinnassaṃśleṣa iti yāvat /	aByAsaFgasya saMSlezasya aviyogaH avicCedaH avicCinna ssaMSlezaH iti yAvat /
   tena parasparānukūlyasya parasparopakāritvasya lābha ityartha .	tena paraspara AnukUlyasya paraspara upakAri tvasya lABaH iti arTa .
   atrāvicchinnassaṃśleṣo lakṣyārthaḥ, paraspanukūlyalābhastu vyaṅgya iti	atra avicCinna ssaMSlezaH lakzya arTaH, para spanukUlya lABaH tu vyaFgyaH iti
   vivekaḥ /	vivekaH /
   uparaktaḥ sambaddhaḥ /	uparaktaH sambadDaH /
   arthāntaraṃ cāha  makarandenetyādi /	arTa antaram ca aha  makarandena ityAdi /
   pītamiśro raktaḥ kaṣāyavarṇaḥ sarvasyeti bahuvacanārthakathanam /	pIta miSraH raktaH kazAya varNaH sarvasya iti bahuvacana arTa kaTanam /
   tathāvidhasya strītvaviśiṣṭasya /	taTAviDasya strI tva viSizwasya /
   trailokyetyādi gamyārthakathanam /	trElokya ityAdi gamya arTa kaTanam /
   surataglānimityetatsuratakṛtāṃ glāniṃ surataviṣayāṃ glānimityubhayathā	surata glAnim iti etat surata kRtAm glAnim surata vizayAm glAnim iti uBayaTA
   vivṛṇoti  suratakṛtāmityādi /	vivRNoti   surata kRtAm ityAdi /
   tāntamiti /	tAntam iti /
   śārīraṃ śramamityarthaḥ /	SArIram Sramam iti arTaH /
   glānimiti /	glAnim iti /
   anutsāhamityarthaḥ /	anutsAham iti arTaH /
   na ceti /	na ca iti /
   haratītyanuṣajyate /	harati iti anuzajyate /
   aṅgasya hṛdayasyānukūla ityartho 'pītyāha  hṛdayāntarbhūta iti /	aFgasya hRdayasya anukUlaH iti arTaH api iti Aha   hRdaya antarBUtaH iti /
   snigdha ityarthaḥ /	snigDaH iti arTaH /
   priyatame iti ca padacchedamabhipretya priyatame prārthanā cāṭukāra iti	priyatame iti ca pada= Cedam aBipretya priyatame prArTanA cAwu kAraH iti
   vātaviśeṣaṇatayāpi yojayati  priyatama ityādi /	vAta viSezaNa tayA api yojayati  priyatamaH ityAdi /
   priyatama iti saptamyantasya vivaraṇam  tadviṣayaiti /	priyatamaH iti saptamI antasya vivaraNam  tat vizaya eti /
   prārthanārthamiti /	prArTanA arTam iti /
   strīṇāṃ sambhogaprārthanotpādanamityarthaḥ /	strINAm samBoga prArTana utpAdanam iti arTaH /
   cāṭukāra iti ṇyantātkartari pratyaya ityāha  cāṭūni atra hi	cAwu kAraH iti Ni antAt kartari pratyayaH iti Aha   cAwUni atra hi
   maitrīpadamavivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ /	mEtrI padam avivakzita vAcyaH DvaniH /
   padāntareṣbalakārāntarāṇi /	pada antarezbala kAra antarANi /
   saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārāntarasaṃkīrṇo dhvaniryathā   locanam grāmyaprāya ityarthaḥ	saMsRzwa alaFkAra antara saMkIrNaH DvaniH yaTA  locanam grAmya prAyaH iti arTaH
   priyatamo 'pi ratānte 'ṅgānukūlaḥ saṃvāhanādinā prārthanārthaṃ cāṭukāra	priyatamaH api rata ante aFga anukUlaH saMvAhana AdinA prArTanA arTam cAwu kAra
   evameva surataglāniṃ harati /	evam eva surata glAnim harati /
   kūjitaṃ cānaṅgīkaraṇavacanādi madhuradhvanitaṃ dīrghīkaroti /	kUjitam ca anaFgIkaraNa vacana Adi maDura Dvanitam dIrGIkaroti /
   cāṭukaraṇāvasare ca sphuṭitaṃ vikasitaṃ yatkamalakāntidhārivadanaṃ tasya	cAwu karaNa avasare ca sPuwitam vikasitam yat kamala kAnti DAri vadanam tasya
   yāmodamaitrī sahajasaurabhaparicayastena kaṣāya uparakto bhavati /	yAmoda mEtrI sahaja sOraBa paricayaH tena kazAyaH uparaktaH Bavati /
   aṅgeṣu cātuṣṣaṣṭikaprayogeṣvanukūlaḥ /	aFgezu cAtuzzazwika prayogezu anukUlaH /
   evaṃ śabdarūpagandhasparśā yatra hṛdyā yatra ca pavano 'pa tathā nāgarikaḥ	evam Sabda rUpa ganDa sparSAH yatra hRdyAH yatra ca pavanaH apa taTA nAgarikaH
   sa tavāvaśyamabhigantavyo deśa iti meghaḍhūte meghaṃ prati kāmina	sa tava avaSyam aBigantavyaH deSaH iti meGa XUte meGam prati kAmina
   iyamuktiḥ /	iyamuktiH /
   udāharaṇe lakṣaṇaṃ yojayati  maitrīpadamiti /	udAharaNe lakzaNam yojayati   mEtrI padam iti /
   hiśabdo 'nantaraṃ paṭhitavya ityuktameva /	hi SabdaH anantaram paWitavyaH iti uktam eva /
   alaṅkārāntarāṇīti /	alaFkAra antarANi iti /
   utprekṣāsvabhāvoktirūpakopamāḥ krameṇetyarthaḥ /	utprekzA svaBAva ukti rUpaka upamAH krameNa iti arTaH /
   evamiyatā saguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaiḥ sālaṅkāraiḥ sahaprabhedaiḥ svaiḥ /	evam iyatA sa guNIBUta vyaFgyEH sa alaFkArEH saha praBedEH svEH /
   saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭibhyām /	saFkara saMsRzwiByAm /
   ityetadantaṃ vyākhyāyodāharaṇāni ca nirūpya 'punarapi' iti yatkārikābhāge	iti etat antam vyAKyAya udAharaNAni ca nirUpya apunar api a iti yad kArikA BAge
   padadvayaṃ tasyārthaṃ prakāśayatyudāharaṇadvāreṇaiva   saṃsṛṣṭetyādi /	pada dvayam tasya arTam prakASayati udAharaNa dvAreNa eva    saMsRzwa ityAdi /
   punaḥśabdasyāyamarthaḥ   na kevalaṃ dhvaneḥ svaprabhedādibhiḥ	punar Sabdasya ayam arTaH   na kevalam DvaneH sva praBeda AdiBiH
   saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau vivakṣitau yāvatteṣāmanyonyamapi svaprabhedānāṃ bālapriyā	saMsRzwi saFkarO vivakzitO yAvat tezAm anyonyam api sva praBedAnAm bAlapriyA
   kārayatīti /	kArayati iti /
   etadeva vivṛṇoti  priyatamo 'pītyādi /	etat eva vivRNoti  priyatamaH api ityAdi /
   teneti /	tena iti /
   vātenetyarthaḥ /	vAtena iti arTaH /
   parasparetyādi /	paraspara ityAdi /
   strīṇāṃ priyatamasya ca sambhogābhilāṣoddīpakatvāditi bhāvaḥ /	strINAm priyatamasya ca samBoga aBilAza uddIpaka tvAt iti BAvaH /
   siprāparicita iti siprāyā nāyikātvaṃ gamyate /	siprA paricitaH iti siprAyAH nAyikA tvam gamyate /
   itīti hetau /	iti iti hetO /
   upamāne priyatame 'pi viśeṣaṇāni yojayati  priyatamo 'pītyādi /	upamAne priyatame api viSezaNAni yojayati  priyatamaH api ityAdi /
   saṃvāhanādinā aṅgānukūla iti yojanā /	saMvAhana AdinA aFga anukUlaH iti yojanA /
   cāṭukāra iti /	cAwu kAraH iti /
   cāṭuvākyakartetyarthaḥ /	cAwu vAkya kartA iti arTaH /
   anaṅgīkaraṇavacaneti /	anaFgIkaraNa vacanA iti /
   mālamityādivacanenetyarthaḥ /	mAlam ityAdi vacanena iti arTaH /
   madakalamityasya vivaraṇam  madhuradhvanitamiti /	mada kalam iti asya vivaraNam   maDura Dvanitam iti /
   cāṭivatyādi /	ca awivati Adi /
   priyatamacāṭuvākyaśravaṇāvasara ityarthaḥ /	priyatama cAwu vAkya SravaNa avasaraH iti arTaH /
   vikasitamiti /	vikasitam iti /
   cāṭuśravaṇajanitasmiteneti bhāvaḥ /	cAwu SravaNa janita smitena iti BAvaH /
   kamalapadaṃ sādhyavasānalakṣaṇayā mukhaparamityāha  kamaletyādi /	kamala padam sADyavasAna lakzaNayA muKa param iti Aha   kamala ityAdi /
   vadanamiti /	vadanam iti /
   strīṇāmiti śeṣaḥ /	strINAm iti SezaH /
   aṅgānukūla ityetadanyathāpi vyācaṣṭe  aṅgeṣvityādi /	aFga anukUlaH iti etat anyaTA api vyAcazwe  aFgezu ityAdi /
   ślokasyāsya sārārthaṃ darśayan vivaraṇamupasaṃharati  evamityādi /	Slokasya asya sAra arTam darSayan vivaraNam upasaMharati  evam ityAdi /
   sa deśa iti /	sa deSaH iti /
   ujjayinīdeśa ityarthaḥ /	ujjayinI deSaH iti arTaH /
   utprekṣetyādi /	utprekza ityAdi /
   paṭu dīghokurvannityatra gamyotprekṣā, pratyūṣasvabhāvoktiḥ, aṅgānukūlaḥ	pawu dIGokurvan= iti atra gamya utprekzA, pratyUza svaBAva uktiH, aFga anukUlaH
   snigdha ityasya vāyāvāropādrūpakaṃ, yadvā  rūpakamityasya	snigDaH iti asya vAyO= AropAt rUpakan, yat vA  rUpakam iti asya
   rūpakātiśayoktirityarthaḥ /	rUpaka atiSaya uktiH iti arTaH /
   kamalapadena mukhasya bodhanāttatra sā bodhya /	kamala padena muKasya boDanAt tatra sA boDya /
   priyatama ivetyupamā cetyarthaḥ /	priyatamaH iva iti upamA ca iti arTaH /
   saṃsṛṣṭetyādigranthamavatārayati  evamiyatetyādi /	saMsRzwa ityAdi granTam avatArayati  evam iyata ityAdi /
   teṣāmanyonyamapīti /	tezAm anyonyam api iti /
   dantakṣatāni karajaiśca vipāṭitāni prodbhinnasāndrapulake bhavataḥ śarīre	danta kzatAni karajEH ca vipAwitAni prodBinna sAndra pulake BavataH SarIre
   dattāni raktamanasā mṛgarājavadhvā jātaspṛhairmunibhirapyavalokitāni //	dattAni rakta manasA mRgarAja vaDvA jAta spRhEH muniBiH api avalokitAni //
   atra hi samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇa	atra hi samAsa ukti saMsRzwena viroDa alaFkAreNa
   saṃkīrṇasyālakṣyakamavyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam /	saMkIrNasya alakzyakam avyaFgyasya DvaneH prakASanam /
   dayāvīrasya paramārthato vākyārthībhūtatvāt /	dayA vIrasya paramArTataH vAkya arTIBUta tvAt /
   locanam svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vā saṅkīrṇānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ ca	locanam sva praBedEH guNIBUta vyaFgyena vA saFkIrNAnAm saMsRzwAnAm ca
   dhvanīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca durlakṣamiti vispaṣṭodāharaṇaṃ na	DvanInAm saFkIrNa tvam saMsRzwa tvam ca durlakzam iti vispazwa udAharaNam na
   bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇālaṅkārasyālaṅkāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭasya saṃkīrṇasya vā dhvanau	Bavati iti aBiprAyeNa alaFkArasya alaFkAreNa saMsRzwasya saMkIrNasya vA DvanO
   saṃkarasaṃsargau pradarśanīyau /	saMkara saMsargO pradarSanIyO /
   tadasmin bhedacatuṣṭaye prathamaṃ bhedamudāharati  dantakṣātanīti /	tat asmin Beda catuzwaye praTamam Bedam udAharati  dantakzAtani iti /
   bodhisattvasya svakiśorabhakṣaṇapravṛttāṃ siṃho prati nijaśarīraṃ	boDisattvasya sva kiSora BakzaNa pravRttAm siMhaH prati nija SarIram
   vitīrṇavataḥ kenaciccāṭukaṃ kriyate /	vitIrNavataH kenacid cAwukam kriyate /
   prodbhūtaḥ sāndraḥ pulakaḥ parārthasampattijenānandabhareṇa yatra /	prodBUtaH sAndraH pulakaH para arTa sampatti jena Ananda BareNa yatra /
   rakte rudhire mano 'bhilāṣo yasyāḥ, anuraktaṃ ca mano yasyāḥ /	rakte ruDire manaH aBilAzaH yasyAH, anuraktam ca manaH yasyAH /
   manuyaścodbodhitamadanāveśāśceti virodhaḥ /	manuyaH ca udboDita madana AveSAH ca iti viroDaH /
   jātaspṛhairiti ca vayamapi kadācidevaṃ kāruṇikapadavīmadhirokṣyāmastadā	jAta spRhEH iti ca vayam api kadAcid evam kAruNika padavIm aDirokzyAmaH tadA
   satyato munayo bhaviṣyāma iti manorājyayuktaiḥ /	satyataH munayaH BavizyAmaH iti manoH Ajya yuktEH /
   samāsoktiśca nāyikāvṛttāntapratīteḥ /	samAsa uktiH ca nAyikA vRttAnta pratIteH /
   dayāvīrasyeti /	dayA vIrasya iti /
   dayāprayuktatvādatra dharmasya dharmavīra eva dayāvīraśabdenoktaḥ /	dayA prayukta tvAt atra Darmasya Darma vIraH eva dayA vIra Sabdena uktaH /
   vīraścātra rasaḥ, utsāhasyaiva sthāyitvāditi bhāvaḥ /	vIraH ca atra rasaH, utsAhasya eva sTAyi tvAt iti BAvaH /
   dayāvīraśabdena vā śāntaṃ vyapadiśata /	dayA vIra Sabdena vA SAntam vyapadiSata /
   so 'tra bālapriyā saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau vivakṣitāvityanuṣaṅgaḥ /	saH atra bAla priyA saMsRzwi saFkarO vivakzitO= iti anuzaFgaH /
   ayamartha iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /	ayam arTaH iti pUrveNa sambanDaH /
   nanvevaṃ vṛttau saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārāntarasaṅkīrṇatvādibhedamātrapradarśane kiṃ	nanu evam vRttO saMsRzwa alaFkAra antara saFkIrNa tva Adi Beda mAtra pradarSane kim
   bījamityata āha  svaprabhedānāmityādi /	bIjam iti atas Aha  su a praBedAnAm ityAdi /
   dhvanineti /	DvaninA iti /
   dhvaninā sahetyarthaḥ /	DvaninA saha iti arTaH /
   durllakṣamitīti /	durllakzam iti iti /
   durllakṣatvāddhetorityarthaḥ /	durllakza tvAt hetoH iti arTaH /
   vispaṣṭeti /	vispazwa iti /
   suspaṣṭetyarthaḥ /	su spazwA iti arTaH /
   pradarśanīyau pradarśayituṃ śakyau /	pradarSanIyO pradarSayitum SakyO /
   prathamaṃ bhedamiti /	praTamam Bedam iti /
   saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvarūpaṃ bhedamityarthaḥ /	saMsRzwa alaFkAra saFkIrNa tva rUpam Bedam iti arTaH /
   parārthasampattijeneti /	para arTa sampatti jena iti /
   paraparitrāṇajanyenetyarthaḥ /	para paritrANa janyena iti arTaH /
   nāyikāsambhogajanyena ceti /	nAyikA samBoga janyena ca iti /
   bhavataśśarīra ityanena kāminaśśarīra iti, mṛgarājavadhvetyanena	BavataH SarIraH iti anena kAminaH SarIraH iti, mRgarAja vaDvA iti anena
   mṛgākhyapuñjātiviśeṣasya vadhveti ca gamyate /	mRga AKya puQjA ati viSezasya vaDvA iti ca gamyate /
   munibhirapi jātaspṛhairityatra	muniBiH api jAta spRhEH iti atra
   viṣayaviraktairapyudbuddhakāmairityarthapratītyā virodha	vizaya viraktEH api udbudDa kAmEH iti arTa pratItyA viroDa
   ityāha  munayaścetyādi /	iti Aha   munayaH ca ityAdi /
   prakṛtamarthamāha  jātaspṛhairityādi /	prakRtam arTa mAha  jAta spRhEH ityAdi /
   manorājyayuktaiśceti yojanā /	manorAjya yuktEH ca iti yojanAH /
   muninā dayāvīrasyākathanādāha  dayetyādi /	muninA dayA vIrasya akaTanA dAha   dayA ityAdi /
   dharmasya dayāprayuktatvādatra dayāvīraśabdena dharmavīra evokta iti	Darmasya dayA prayukta tvAt atra dayA vIra Sabdena Darma vIraH eva uktaH iti
   sambandhaḥ /	sambanDaH /
   pakṣāntaramāha  dayāvīraśabdenetyādi /	pakza antaram Aha  dayA vIra Sabdena ityAdi /
   samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭenetyādivṛttayuktaṃ vivṛṇoti  so 'tretyādi /	samAsa ukti saMsRzwena ityAdi vRtta yuktam vivRNoti  saH atra ityAdi /
   sa rasaḥ dharmavīraśśānto vā saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca	sa rasaH Darma vIraH SAntaH vA saMsRzwa alaFkAra saMsRzwa tvam ca
   dhvaneryathā   	DvaneH yaTA   
   ahiṇaapaoarasaesu pahiasāmāiesu diahesu /	ahiNaa paoa rasaesu pahiasAmAiesu diahesu /
   sohai pasāraagiāṇaṃ ṇacciaṃ moravandāṇam //	sohE pasAraa giANam Nacciam moravan dANam //
   locanam rasaḥ saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkāreṇānugṛhyate /	locanam rasaH saMsRzwa alaFkAreNa anugRhyate /
   samāsoktimahamnā hyayamarthaḥ sampadyate  yathā	samAsa uktimahamnAH hi ayam arTaH sampadyate  yaTA
   kaścinmanorathaśataprārthitapreyasīsambhogāvasare jātapulakastathā tvaṃ	kaScid manoraTa Sata prArTita preyasI samBoga avasare jAta pulakaH taTA tvam
   parārthasampādanāya svaśarīradāna ita karuṇātiśayo	para arTa sampAdanAya sva SarIra dAnaH ita karuNA atiSayaH 
   'nubhāvavibhāvasampadoddīpitaḥ /	anuBAva viBAva sampadA uddIpitaH /
   dvivaseṣu /	dvi vasezu /
   tathā pathikān prati śyāmāyiteṣu mohajanakatvādrātrirūpatāmācaritavatsu /	taTA paTikAn prati SyAmAyitezu moha janaka tvAt rAtri rUpa tAm Acaritavatsu /
   yadi vā pathikānāṃ śyāmāyitaṃ duḥkhavaśena śyāmikā yebhyaḥ /	yadi vA paTikAnAm SyAmAyitam duHKa vaSena SyAmikAH yeByaH /
   śobhate prasāritagrīvāṇāṃ mayūravṛndānāṃ nṛttam /	SoBate prasArita grIvANAm mayUra vRndAnAm nRttam /
   abhinayaprayogarasikeṣu pathikasāmājakeṣu satsu mayūravṛndānāṃ	aBinaya prayoga rasikezu paTika sAmAjakezu satsu mayUra vRndAnAm
   prasāritagītānāṃ prakṛṣṭasāraṇānusārigītānāṃ tathā grīvārecakāya	prasArita gItAnAm prakRzwa sAraNa anusAri gItAnAm taTA grIvA recakAya
   prasāritagrīvāṇāṃ nṛttaṃ śobhate /	prasArita grIvANAm nRttam SoBate /
   pathikān prati śyāmā ivācarantīti kyac /	paTikAn prati SyAmAH iva Acaranti iti kyat /
   pratyayena luptopamā nirdiṣṭā /	pratyayena lupta upamA nirdizwA /
   pathikasāmājikeṣviti karmadhārayasya spaṣṭatvādrūpakam /	paTika sAmAjikezu iti karma DArayasya spazwa tvAt rUpakam /
   tābhyāṃ dhvaneḥ saṃsarga iti granthakārasyāśayaḥ /	tAByAm DvaneH saMsargaH iti granTa kArasya ASayaH /
   atraivodāharaṇe'nyadbhedadvayamudāhartuṃ śakyamityāśayenodāharaṇāntaraṃ na	atra eva udAharaNe anyat Beda dvayam udAhartum Sakyam iti ASayena udAharaNa antaram na
   dattam /	dattam /
   tathāhi  vyāghrāderākṛtigaṇatve pathikasāmājikeṣvityupamārūpakābhyāṃ	taTA hi   vyAGra AdeH AkRti gaNa tve paTika sAmAjikezu iti upamA rUpakAByAm
   bālapriyā rasaḥ /	bAla priyAH rasaH /
   saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkāreṇeti /	saMsRzwa alaFkAreNa iti /
   samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇetyarthaḥ /	samAsa ukti saMsRzwena viroDa alaFkAreNa iti arTaH /
   munibhirapi jātaspṛhairavalokitānītyanena dayāvīrasya paripoṣapratītyā	muniBiH api jAta spRhEH avalokitAni iti anena dayA vIrasya paripoza pratItyA
   virodhasyānugrāhakatvaṃ spaṣṭamiti manasi kṛtya	viroDasya anugrAhaka tvam spazwam iti manasi kRtya
   samāsoktestadupapādayati  samāsoktimahimnetyādi /	samAsa ukteH tad upapAdayati   samAsa ukti mahimnA ityAdi /
   itīti /	iti iti /
   ityarthādityarthaḥ /	iti arTAt iti arTaH /
   anubhāvetyādi /	anuBAva ityAdi /
   anubhāvaḥ sāndrapulakāvirbhāvaḥ /	anuBAvaH sAndra pulakA virBAvaH /
   ālambanavibhāvaḥ siṃhī /	Alambana viBAvaH siMhI /

   dvitīyamiti /	dvitIyam iti /
   saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvarūpamityarthaḥ /	saMsRzwa alaFkAra saMsRzwa tva rUpam iti arTaH /
   abhinavetyādi /	aBinava ityAdi /
   varṣāvarṇanam /	varzAvarNanam /
   atrādau vācyamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe  abhinavamityādi /	atra AdO vAcyam arTam vyAcazwe  aBinavam ityAdi /
   pathikān virahiṇaḥ /	paTikAn virahiNaH /
   iyāmāyitoṣvityatra rātrivācakāt śyāmāśabdādācārārthe kyajityabhipretya	iyAmAyitozu iti atra rAtri vAcakAt SyAmA SabdAt AcAra arTe kyajiti aBipretya
   vyācaṣṭe  mohetyādi /	vyAcazwe  moha ityAdi /
   śyāmāyitamityasya śyāmiketyarthamabhipretyāha  yadi vetyādi /	SyAmAyitam iti asya SyAmikA iti arTam aBipretya aha  yadi vA ityAdi /
   śyāmikā varṇabhedaḥ /	SyAmikA varNa BedaH /
   chāyāntaradarśanenātra vyaṅgyamarthaṃ darśayati  abhinayaprayogetyādi /	CAyA antara darSanena atra vyaFgyam arTam darSayati   aBinaya prayoga ityAdi /
   prasāritagītānāmityasya vyākhyānam  prakṛṣṭetyādi /	prasArita gItAnAm iti asya vyAKyAnam   prakRzwa ityAdi /
   atra pakṣe prasāritagrīvāṇāmiti ca yojyamityāha  tathetyādi /	atra pakze prasArita grIvANAm iti ca yojyam iti Aha   taTA ityAdi /
   dhvaneḥ saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ vivṛṇoti  pathikānityādi /	DvaneH saMsRzwa alaFkAra saMsRzwa tvam vivRNoti  paTikAn ityAdi /
   rūpakamiti /	rUpakam iti /
   pathikeṣu sāmājikatvāropāditi bhāvaḥ /	paTikezu sAmAjika tva AropAt iti BAvaH /
   dhvaneriti /	DvaneH iti /
   abhinayaprayogetyādyuktasya vyaṅgyasyetyarthaḥ /	aBinaya prayoga ityAdi uktasya vyaFgyasya iti arTaH /
   saṃsargaḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /	saMsargaH saMsRzwiH /
   anyadbhedadvayamiti /	anyat Beda dvayam iti /
   atra hyupamārūpakābhyāṃ śabdaśaktyudbhavānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ	atra hi upamArUpakAByAm Sabda Sakti udBava anuraNana rUpa vyaFgyasya DvaneH
   saṃsṛṣṭatvam /	saMsRzwa tvam /
   evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda bhedāś ca kena śakyante /	evam DvaneH praBedAH praBeda BedAH ca kena Sakyante /
   saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //	saFKyAtum diF  mAtram tezAm idam uktam asmABiH // DhvK_3.44 //
   evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabhedabhedāśca kena śakyante /	evam DvaneH praBedAH praBeda BedAH ca kena Sakyante /
   saṃkhyātuṃ diṅmātraṃ teṣāmidamuktamasmābhiḥ // 44 //	saMKyAtum diS mAtram tezAm idam uktam asmABiH // 44 //
   anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅmātraṃ	anantAH hi DvaneH prakArAH sahRdayAnAm vyutpattaye tezAm diS mAtram
   kathitam /	kaTitam /
   ity ukta lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ	iti ukta  lakzaNaH yaH DvaniH vivecyaH prayatnataH sadBiH
   sat kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //	sat kAvyam kartum vA jQAtum vA samyak aBiyuktEH // DhvK_3.45 //
   ityuktalakṣaṇo yo dhvanirvivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ /	iti ukta lakzaNaH yaH DvaniH vivecyaH prayatnataH sadBiH /
   satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātu vā samyagabhiyuktaiḥ // 45 //	sat kAvyam kartum vA jQAtu vA samyak aBiyuktEH // 45 //
   uktasvarūpadhvaninirūpaṇanipuṇā hi satkavayaḥ sahṛdayāśca niyatameva	ukta svarUpa Dvani nirUpaNa nipuNAH hi sat kavayaH sahRdayAH ca niyatam eva
   locanam sandehāspadatvena saṅkīrṇābhyāmabhinayaprayoge, abhinavaprayoge ca	locanam sandeha Aspada tvena saFkIrNAByAm aBinaya prayoge, aBinava prayoge ca
   rasikeṣviti prasāritagītānāmiti yaḥ śabdaśaktyudbhavasta	rasikezu iti prasArita gItAnAm iti yaH Sabda Sakti udBavaH ta
   saṃsargamātramanugrāhyatvābhāvāt /	saMsarga mAtram anugrAhya tva aBAvAt /
   'pahiasāmāiesu' ityatra tu pade saṅkīrṇābhyāṃ tābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāṃ	apahiasAm Aiesu a iti atra tu pade saFkIrNAByAm tAByAm upamArUpakAByAm
   śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatvamekavyañjakānupraveśāditi	Sabda Sakti mUlasya DvaneH saFkIrNa tvam eka vyaQjaka anupraveSAt iti
   saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ /	saFkIrNa alaFkAra saMsRzwaH /
   saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇaścetyapi bhedadvayaṃ mantavyam // 43 //	saFkIrNa alaFkAra saFkIrNaH ca iti api Beda dvayam mantavyam // 43 //
   etadupasaṃharati   evamiti /	etat upasaMha rati   evam iti /
   spaṣṭam // 44 //	spazwam // 44 //
   atha 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti yatsūcitaṃ tadidānīṃ na śabdamātramapi tu	aTa asahRdaya manaH prItaye a iti yat sUcitam tat idAnIm na Sabda mAtram api tu
   nirvyūḍhamityāśayenāha  ityukteta /	nirvyUXam iti ASayena aha   iti ukteta /
   yaḥ prayatnato vivecyaḥ asmābhiścoktalakṣaṇo dhvaniretadeva kāvyatattvaṃ	yaH prayatnataH vivecyaH asmABiH ca ukta lakzaNaH DvaniH etat eva kAvya tattvam
   yathoditena prapañcanirūpaṇādinā vyākartumaśaknuvadbhiralaṅkāraiḥ rītayaḥ	yaTA uditena prapaQca nirUpaNa AdinA vyAkartum aSaknuvadBiH alaFkArEH rItayaH
   bālapriyā	bAlapriyA
   saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvasaṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvarūpabhedadvayamityarthaḥ	saFkIrNa alaFkAra saMsRzwa tva saFkIrNa alaFkAra saFkIrNa tva rUpa Beda dvayam iti arTaH
   saṅkīrṇābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāmiti sambandha  /	saFkIrNAByAm upamArUpakAByAm iti sambanDa /
